23-year-old Katherine lives with her husband and son in her mother's house.  The house has water and electricity and is located in Olmos district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

Katherine has been selling clothes for all the family for four years.  She set up her business in her home and she sells merchandise to her customers.  She also provides merchandise to order.  She tries to increase her customer demand so that she can make more income with which to cover her family expenses.

As she saw that her business was improving every day, Katherine decided it was necessary to request a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she could buy a larger quantity of merchandise and stock her store with new products.  She aims to continue to increase her number of customers so that she can repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life.  Katherine takes good care of her family and, together with her husband, she tries to ensure that her son never wants for anything.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen de 37 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.    Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Carmen a colocado un bazar donde ofrece todo tipo de productos para el hogar papel lustre y de regalo en su domicilio, desde hace algunos año, también trae a pedido adornos, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos personales.

Al observar que su negocio va creciendo Carmen a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para implementar comprando más mercadería como productos y otros productos para el hogar, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando en su bazar para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida, para seguir apoyando económicamente a sus padres.
texts.en:
37-year-old Carmen is single and lives in her parents' home which only has electricity.  It is located in the rural part of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Carmen has set up a general store in her home where she sells all types of household goods, construction paper and wrapping paper.  She has been in this business for some years.  She also provides decorations to order.  She tries to increase her customer demand so that she can make more income with which to cover her personal needs.

As she could see that her business is growing, Carmen decided it was necessary to request a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to stock her business, buying more merchandise and household goods.  She hopes to continue increasing her number of customers so that she can repay her loan and improve her quality of life.  She would like to continue financially supporting her parents.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel de 55 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Ferreñafe que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Manuel brinda el servicio de alquilar maquinaria agrícola para hacer surcos en las tierras de cultivo desde hace varios años, es conocido en la zona donde vive porque muy pocos se dedican a esa actividad y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su familia.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles  para brindar mantenimiento a su maquinaria y siga trabajando optimamanete como hasta el momento, lo que le permitirá tener ganancias para pagar su crédito y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Manuel es un hombre de trabajador, correcto y responsable que trata que su familia se supere y que sus hijos logren sus metas trazadas.
texts.en:
55-year-old Manuel lives with his family in his own home which has water and electricity.  His home is located in Ferreñafe district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and tourism.

Manuel provides a service hiring out equipment for making furrows in farmland.  He has been in this business for several years and is well known in his area as there are very few people in this line of work.  He uses the income that he makes to cover his family's daily needs.

Manuel has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can carry out maintenance work on the equipment that he hires out.  This will enable him to continue working optimally as he has up to now.  He will use the profits he makes to repay his loan and improve his quality of life.  Manuel is a hard-working, polite and responsible man who would like his family to do well and for his children to achieve their goals.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance work on the farming equipment that he hires out

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora D. 57 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, sushijos viven independientemente, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana D. la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, transporte público y turismo.

DesD. hace 10 años aproximadamente Dora se ha dedicado a la venta D. abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos), verduras D. todo tipo y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en un puesto que tiene en el mercado D. lamisma zona donD. vive, con las ganancias por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades D. su casa.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo D. que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones.  Dora es una mujer dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su familia al igual que mejorar económicamente.
texts.en:
57-year-old Dora lives with her husband in her own home.  Their children live independently.  Dora's home has all basic services and is located in the urban area of Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for its commercial activity, public transport and tourism.

For ten years Dora has sold groceries (everyday products such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna and eggs), all types of vegetables, and drinks.  Her business in located in the local market.  She uses the profits she makes from selling her products to cover all her household expenses and needs.

In order to expand her business, Dora has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will buy more merchandise to stock her business.  Her sole aim is to grow her business and have more products to offer her customers.  This will enable her to repay her loan and meet her obligations.  Dora is a committed and hard-working woman who works to proviD. her family with more comforts in life and improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel de 64 años, es soltera, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicado en el distrito de Chepén que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona de actividad comercial, agrícola y turismo.

Ysabel cuenta con su negocio de comida y venta de gaseosas en su domicilio, actividad que realiza desde  hace 4 años, cuenta con su propia clientela, es conocida por la limpieza y la buena sazón que tiene, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y cubrirá sus necesidades diarias.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos, utensilios y una refrigeradora que le ayudar a tener las bebidas heladas, para  seguir brindando un buen servicio a sus clientes y con sus ganancias cubrir sus gastos personales.  Ysabel con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza de sus clientes, con la finalidad de que más adelante tenga un negocio grande donde ofrezca todo tipo de comida.
texts.en:
64-year-old Ysabel is single.  She lives in her own home which has all basic services and is located in Chepén district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its commercial activity, farming and tourism.

Ysabel has a business selling food and soda from her home.  She has been in this business for four years and has her own customer base.  She is known for her hygiene and the good taste of her food.  She will use her income to create a better quality of life for herself and cover her daily needs.

Ysabel has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy supplies, utensils and a fridge to help her keep her drinks cold.  This will enable her to continue providing her customers with a good service.  She will use her profits to cover her personal expenses.  Through her work and her desire to get ahead in life, Ysabel has gained the trust of her customers.  Her aim for the future is to have a large business offering all kinds of food.

loans.use: to buy supplies, utensils and a fridge

loans.name: Jorge De Jesus

texts.es:
Jorge, es agricultor, siembra maíz y frijol, vive con su esposa y tienen dos hijos de 1 y 3 años de edad, tiene casa propia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, con el cual quiere comprar abono y tratamiento para plagas,  este préstamo será una gran ayuda para iniciar el cultivo.
Su objetivo es tener una buena cosecha, tener una gran producción con la que pueda dar a sus hijos lo necesario, el sueño de él es sacar a su familia adelante y educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He lives with his wife and has two children aged 1 and 3.  He owns his own home.

Jorge is requesting a loan for growing corn and beans.  He would like to buy fertilizer and pest treatments.  This loan will be a big help to him in starting his sowing.

Jorge's goal is to enjoy a good harvest and to produce a lot so that he can provide his children with what they need.  His dream is to get his family ahead in life and educate his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pest treatments

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
Mariana, tiene 53 años D. edad, está casada vive, con su hija D. 17 años, administra una tienda en la que ofrece a los clientes artículos D. primera necesidad como aceite, azúcar, frijoles, este negocio tiene más D. 20 años, lo atienD. D. lunes a domingo D. 7:00am a 6:00pm.
Ella comprara mercadería para el negocio, como pan, gaseosas, boquitas, jugos, jabón, esto incrementara su inventario, dándole una mayor satisfacción con los clientes y mejorando sus ventas.
El propósito D. Mariana es que los clientes encuentren en su negocio todo lo relacionado al hogar, por eso a través D. préstamos pretenD. estabilizar el negocio.
texts.en:
Mariana is 53 years old. She is married and lives with her 17 year old daughter. She runs a store where she offers customers basic necessity items such as oil, sugar, and beans. She has had this business for more than 20 years. She works there Monday through Sunday from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. 

She will buy merchandise for the business such as bread, soft drinks, snacks, juice, and soap. This will increase her inventory, giving her customers more satisfaction and increasing her sales.

Mariana's goal is for the customers to find every thing they need for their homes at her business. That is why she intends to stabilize her business through loans.

loans.use: to buy bread, soft drinks, snacks, juice, and soap for her business.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis, vive con sus padres y dos hermanos de las edades de 17 y 16 años, él se dedica a la siembra de maíz y crianza de cerdos, lleva 4 años dedicándose al negocio, trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Por el momento está realizando el cultivo, para esto solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en abono y plaguicidas, esta compra será una gran ayuda para él, porque le brindara el cuido necesario al cultivo con la esperanza que produzca abundantemente.
El sueño de Luis es continuar trabajando e incrementando los cultivos, en un futuro formar su familia.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his parents and two brothers aged 17 and 16.  He grows corn and raises pigs.  He has been in this business for four years and works Monday to Saturday.

Right now, Luis is growing his crops and he is requesting a loan to invest in buying fertilizer and pesticides.  This purchase will be a big help to him as it will enable him to provide his crops with the care they need.  He hopes that this will make them grow abundantly.

Luis' dream is to continue working and increasing his crops.  In the future he would like to have a family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Jose Leopoldo

texts.es:
José, vive con su familia, tiene dos hijos de 18 y 14 años de edad, él se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, tiene 10 años de estar en el negocio, inicio en esta área por un tío, quien también se dedica al negocio.
Actualmente necesita comprar dos terneros, y lo hará a través del préstamo, ya que quiere aprovechar la oportunidad de aumentar su ganado, ya que de él depende su familia.
Las aspiraciones de José son, ayudar a sus hijos, velar por que continúen estudiando, también que cuenten con la alimentación necesaria.
texts.en:
José lives with his family. He has two children, aged 18 and 14. He buys and sells cattle and has 10 years' experience in the business. He began in this area through and uncle, who is also in the business. 

At present, he needs to buy two calves. He will do it through the loan, since he wants to take advantage of the opportunity to increase his number of cattle, since this is what his family depends on. 

Jose's goals are helping his children, making sure that they continue their studies as well as keeping them well fed.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa Emilia de 33 años de edad, habita en casa propia con sus 2 hijos los cuales por el momento se encuentran estudiando. Rosa es una mujer luchadora que con muchos esfuerzos ha logrado sacar adelante a sus queridos hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio. Gracias a sus esfuerzos, trabajo y la ayuda de Dios ha logrado establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia en la cual vende todo tipo de producto de primera necesidad tales como: huevos, frijoles, arroz, detergente, golosinas, etc. Para Rosa lo más importante son sus hijos, sueña en que un día los verá convertidos en grades profesionales y podrán tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida. Su negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos de primera necesidad de tal manera que su tiendita siempre cuente con lo necesario y los clientes puedan seguir prefiriéndola como hasta el momento. Con el crédito desea comprar más productos de tienda como: frijoles, arroz, huevos, pan, golosinas, café, detergente y de mas productos que resulten atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño.
texts.en:
33-year-old Rosa Emilia lives in her own home together with her two children who are currently in school.  Rosa is a hard-working woman who, with a lot of effort, has managed to get her beloved children ahead in life.  Rosa is a shopkeeper.  Thanks to her efforts, hard work and God's help, she has managed to set up a small store in her home where she sells all kinds of essential household products such as eggs, beans, rice, detergent, candies, etc.

The most important thing in Rosa's life are her children.  She dreams of one day seeing them become professionals, enjoying a better quality of life.  Rosa's business is her main source of income and, for this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  She will invest in her business by purchasing essential products so that her small store always has what people need.  This means that her customers will remain loyal to her business as they have up to now.  She would like to use her loan to buy more products for her store such as beans, rice, eggs, bread, candies, coffee, detergent, and other products that appeal to her customers.  In this way, she hopes to fulfil her dream.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store such as beans, rice, eggs, bread, candies, coffee, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Béathe

texts.fr:
Béathe  est commerçante. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 31 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 3 enfants de 2 à 11 ans, dont 2 scolarisés. 

C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter une moto utilisée comme taxi-moto. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est améliorer l’accueille des clients et travailler beaucoup d’heure par jour pour augmenter le capital. Dans les prochaines années, Béathe voudrait augmenter son capital afin d’acheter la camionnette destine à la distribution des marchandises des clients. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et améliore le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en: Béathe was born in Rwanda and is a 31-year-old shopkeeper. She is married with 3 children between the ages of 2 and 11. Two of her children attend school. This is Béathe´s first loan cycle with ACB; she will use it to buy a bike to use as a motorcycle taxi. She plans to grow her business and increase her capital by improving levels of customer service and working long hours. In the coming years, Béathe would like to build up enough capital to allow her to buy a van with which to make customer deliveries. She plans to use the profits generated by the business to pay for her children's education and improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy a bike to use as a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
SEGUNDO tiene 58 años de edad es casado, vive con la esposa y los dos hijos de veintinueve y veintitrés años de edad en el  Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los Miembros de la VRC Voluntad de Dios, se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad la cría, Parroquia Guanujo a una distancia de 20 minutos perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la Agricultura y ganadería.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 3 cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, maíz, trigo, habas, alverja además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, líquidos para plagas, insumos y  para sembrar papas e incrementar su negocio. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando. 

Su sueño es tener salud para poder seguir adelante, ampliar su producción, tener una vida tranquila y sacar a sus hijos adelante. 

Le gusta las festividades del carnaval y las del sector.
texts.en:
Segundo is 58 years old, married and lives with his wife and two sons, 29 and 23, in Guaranda canton, in Bolivar province.

The members of Voluntad de Dios communal bank are located in La Cria community, about 20 minutes from Guanujo parish in Guaranda canton. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and livestock.

Segundo is an agriculturalist and stock breeder. He has his own home and 3 cuadras of land [approximately 4.5 acres]. He plants potatoes, corn, wheat, fava beans and peas and also raises different kinds of animals such as pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs. He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda.

He is requesting the loan to buy compost, seeds, fertilizer, liquid pesticides for pest infestations, supplies for planting potatoes and to increase his business. The loan will help to provide for his economic needs and to improve his agricultural activities. He faces challenges such as the rise and fall of prices for the products he markets, as well as the sudden changes in the weather that we are now experiencing.

His dream is to be healthy in order to get ahead, to expand his production, to have a peaceful life and to help his sons get ahead.

He enjoys the celebrations at Carnival and especially those held in his area.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizer, liquid pesticides for pest infestations and supplies to plant potatoes and to increase his business.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen D. 57 años D. edad, habita en su propia casa con su familia la cual está integrada por su esposo y sus dos hijas.  Carmen se dedica a la venta D. lácteos es decir: crema, queso, leche, etc. Ha trabajado toda su vida para poder sacar adelante a su querida familia y gracias a Dios siempre ha podido darles el pan D.  cada día. Es una mujer muy carismática y gracias a esto ha logrado ganarse la confianza D. muchas personas D. la zona donD. ella habita. Los clientes la prefieren ya que es una mujer muy amable, trabajadora, higiénica y además ofrece los mejores precios. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra D. lácteos, ella compra por botellas la leche y luego D. un proceso realizado por ella obtiene: crema, queso fresco conocido por "cuajada", y requeson. Solicita el préstamo con el fin D. poder contar con suficiente producto dado que en esta época del año, invierno es cuando mas abunda la leche y los clientes consumen mas sus derivados. Espera con ésto aumentar el nivel D. ventas que le generen un mayor nivel D. ingresos y por consecuencia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
57-year-old Carmen lives in her own home with her family which consists of her husband and two daughters.  Carmen sells dairy products: cream, cheese, milk, etc.  She has worked her whole life to get her beloved family ahead in life.  Thanks to God, she has always been able to proviD. for them.  Carmen is a very charismatic woman and, as a result, she has managed to gain the trust of many people in her area.  Her customers prefer to buy from her as she is a very kind, hard-working, hygienic woman who offers her customers the best prices.

Carmen has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying dairy products.  She buys her milk by the bottle and turns it into cream, young cheese known as 'cuajada' (curd), and cottage cheese.  Carmen is requesting this loan with the aim of having enough supplies available as this time of year (winter) is when milk is most readily available and her customers consume more dairy products.  She hopes to be able to increase her sales levels and make more income so that she can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk

loans.name: Gloria Aracely

texts.es: Gloria Aracely de 38 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su querida hija Marta de 16 años de edad la cual se encuentra estudiando. Gloria es caracterizada por ser una mujer responsable, trabajadora y sobre todo emprendedora. Su principal inspiración es su hija por la cual hace todo para poder darle lo mejor y lograr mejorar su condición de vida. Gloria se dedica a la costura. Ella diseña bonitas prendas de vestir las cuales vende en las principales colonias de la zona donde ella habita. Gracias a su dedicación y calidad en su trabajo ha logrado establecer mucha clientela y es muy conocida ya que ella siempre diseña los mejores vestidos, faldas, blusas, etc. y además los precios son muy accesibles. Este negocio lo ha tenido por mucho tiempo y es el que le ha permitido sacar adelante por si sola a su hija. Gloria sueña con ampliar su negocio y poder ofrecer sus productos a un mayor número de clientes pero para esto necesita cierta cantidad de dinero con la cual no cuenta. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de invertir en la materia prima necesaria como: diferentes telas, hilos, tijeras, etc. todo esto para tener la posibilidad de elaborar mayor número de prendas de vestir y poder  ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de sus productos.  Espera poder tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida a partir de esta decisión.
texts.en:
Gloria Aracely is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her dear daughter, Marta, 16, who is a student. Gloria is characterized as being a responsible, hardworking and, above all, enterprising woman. Her primary inspiration is her daughter for whom she does all she can to give her the best and to improve their standard of living.

Gloria is a seamstress. She designs lovely items to wear which she sells in the major neighborhoods of the area where she lives. Thanks to her dedication and the quality of her work she has succeeded in acquiring many clients and is very well known since she always designs the best dresses, skirts, blouses etc. and also because her prices are very reasonable. She has had this business for a long time and it is what has allowed her and her daughter to get ahead.

Gloria dreams of expanding her business and of being able to offer her products to a greater number of customers, however to do this she needs a certain a certain amount of money which she does not have. It is for this reason that she is requesting this loan from Integral, with the goal of investing it in necessary raw materials such as different fabrics, thread, scissors, etc. all of this to be able to produce a greater number of garments and offer her customers a greater variety of her items. Because of this decision, she hopes to have access to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy necessary raw materials such as different fabrics, thread, scissors, etc.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de cincuenta y seis años de edad habita en su propia casa con su esposa. José ha trabajado toda su vida para poder tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida. Con grandes esfuerzos ha logrado establecer una pequeña carpintería en su hogar de residencia ya que no cuenta con otro lugar para poder colocar su negocio, debido a limitaciones económicas. El negocio es rentable ya que por mucho tiempo  ha logrado sacarlo adelante y darle el pan de cada día a él y a su querida esposa. Su deseo es ver florecer su negocio y para esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de la materia prima necesaria como: madera, pega y herramientas para seguir manteniendo su negocio un paso adelante de la  competencia. Además desea poder mejorar sus ingresos y confía en Dios que así será. De esta manera espera lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José Luis, 50, lives in his own home with his wife. He has worked all his life to be able to have access to a better quality of life. Through great effort, he has succeeded in establishing a small carpentry shop in his home since he has no other place for his business, due to economic restraints.

José’s business is profitable because he has worked for a long time to get ahead and provide food each day for himself and his dear wife. His wish is to see his business flourish and, for this to happen, he has decided to request this loan from Integral in order to buy necessary basic materials such as wood, glue and tools in order to continue keeping his business a step ahead of the competition. In addition, he wants to be able to increase his income and he trusts in God that it will happen. In this way, he hopes to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy necessary basic materials such as wood, glue and tools.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María Elena tiene 25 años de edad es casada, vive con el esposo y el hijo de 4 años en el  Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los Miembros de la VRC Voluntad de Dios, se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad la cría, Parroquia Guanujo a una distancia de 20 minutos perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la Agricultura y ganadería.

María se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 1 cuadra de terreno, siembra papas, maíz, trigo, habas, alverja además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, líquidos para plagas, insumos y  para sembrar papas e incrementar su negocio. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando. 

El sueño es poder comprar un terreno y construir una casa para poder vivir tranquila con la familia.

Le gusta tejer,  visitar a la familia y las festividades del carnaval y las del sector.
texts.en:
María Elena is 25 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and four year old son in the Guaranda canton in the Bolívar province.  The members of the “Voluntad de Dios” (God’s Will) Communal bank can be found in the La Cría community in the Guanujo parish.  It is 20 minutes from the Guaranda canton.  The members of this bank devote themselves to farming and livestock.

María dedicates herself to farming and livestock.  She has her own house and a plot of land.  She grows potatoes, corn, wheat, beans, and peas.  She also raises different animals like pigs, sheep, chicken, and guinea pigs.  She buys and sells her products in the city of Guaranda. 

She is requesting the loan to buy natural and chemical fertilizers, seeds, products for pest infestation, and supplies to plant potatoes and increase her business.  The loan will be a support in supplying her financial needs and improving her farming activities.

She faces challenges like the rise and fall of prices of the products she sells and sudden climate changes like we are now experiencing.  

Her dream is to be able to buy a plot of land and build a house.  Then she will be able to live peacefully with her family.  

She likes to sew, visit her family, and the carnival festivities as well as the ones in her area.

loans.use: to buy natural and chemical fertilizers, seeds, products for pest infestation, and supplies to plant potatoes and increase her business.

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es:
José Vicente tiene 42 años de edad es soltero vive con los hijos de quince, trece años de edad en el  Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los Miembros de la VRC Voluntad de Dios, se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad la cría, Parroquia Guanujo a una distancia de 20 minutos perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la Agricultura y ganadería.

José se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 3 hectareas de terreno, siembra papas, maíz, trigo, habas, alverja además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda

Solicita el crédito para la compra de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, líquidos para plagas, insumos y  para sembrar papas e incrementar su negocio. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando.
 
Su sueño es comprar más tierra para poder sembrar más y ampliar la producción, tener una vida tranquila y sacar a sus hijos adelante. 

Le gusta las festividades del carnaval y las del sector.
texts.en:
José Vicente is 42 years old. He is single and lives with his children, who are thirteen and fifteen, in the Guaranda canton of Bolívar province.

The members of the Voluntad de Dios (Will of God) communal bank are in the La Cría community, 20 minutes away from the parish of Guanujo in the Guaranda canton. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and cattle ranching.

José farms and and raises cattle. He has his own house and 3 hectares of land, and he grows potatoes, corn, wheat, beans, and peas. He also raises other animal species such as pigs, sheep, chickens, and guinea pigs. He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda.

He is asking for the loan to purchase fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, and supplies, and to plant potatoes and increase his business. The loan will help him to supply his economic necessities and improve his agricultural activities. He faces challenges such as fluctuations in prices for the products he sells, as well as the abrupt changes in climate that we are going through.

His dream is to purchase more land in order to be able to plant more and increase production, to have a tranquil life, and to move his children forward.

He likes the festivities of the carnival and those of the group.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, and supplies, and to plant potatoes and increase his business

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta D. 66 años D. edad, resiD. en casa propia en zona muy humilD. del país, con sus dos queridos hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica al comercio D. diferentes productos D. manera ambulante como: verduras, frutas, pollos, pescado, etc. Marta es una mujer ejemplar la cual no se cansa D. trabajar a pesar D. su avanzada edad. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y esta es  la que la impulsa a seguir luchando y trabajando para poder darles el pan D. cada día, va vendiendo por las calles principales y colonias cercanas a donD. resiD.. Y ahora ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin D. surtir su negocio D. tal manera que los clientes siempre que le soliciten algo, ella cuente con ello y queden satisfechos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra D.: verduras, frutas, pollos, pescado, etc. ya que estos son los productos que ella ofrece en su pequeño negocio. Espera que con esta decisión pueda lograr lo que desea y poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Marta is 66 years old. She lives in her own house in a very humble area of the country with her two beloved children, who are students. She sells many different products door-to-door, such as: vegetables, fruits, chickens, fish, etc. Marta is an exemplary woman who does not tire of working in spite of her advanced age. For her, the most important thing is her family, and this is what pushes her to keep fighting and working in order to proviD. them with their daily needs. She goes out selling on the main streets and in neighborhoods near where she lives. Now she has decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan with the goal of stocking her business in such a way so that whenever her customers ask her for something, she will have it, and they will be satisfied. She will invest the loan in the purchase of: vegetables, fruits, chickens, fish, etc., since those are the products she offers in her small business. She hopes that with this decision she will be able to achieve what she wants and will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruit, chickens, fish, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su familia, él inicio hace 12 años con su taller de mecánica y car Wash, trabaja de lunes a domingo, sus clientes son vecinos, lugareños, de este negocio logra sobrevivir, cubriendo todas sus necesidades.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de herramientas para el negocio, mangueras, llaves, para el taller y car Wash, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el trabajo que realiza y brindar un mejor servicio.
Sus aspiraciones es ayudar a su familia, para que se superen, y crecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his family.  Twelve years ago he set up an auto repair shop and car wash.  He works from Monday to Sunday.  His customers are neighbors and local people.  Through his business, he manages to get by and cover all his needs.

Carlos is currently requesting a loan to buy tools for his business: hoses and wrenches for his repair shop and car wash.  This loan will help him to improve the work that he carries out and provide a better service.

Carlos' aspirations are to help his family and to grow in his business.

loans.use: to buy hoses and wrenches for his car wash.

loans.name: Maricela Antonia

texts.es: Maricela Antonia D. 64 años D. edad, vive en casa propia con su hijo el cual ya es mayor D. edad. Maricela se dedica a la venta D. paletas D. diferentes sabores y a la venta D. cosméticos. Es una mujer ejemplar ya que a pesar D. su avanzada edad no se cansa D. trabajar para salir adelante y poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida. Es muy honesta pero sobre todo emprendedora. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es por la que cada día le piD. a Dios que le D. fuerzas para seguir trabajando y poder ayudarles en lo que le sea posible. Una D. las características más notables D. Maricela es que es una mujer muy emprendedora, tiene muchas ideas D. negocio y no le gusta dejar ir ninguna oportunidad D. la cual pueD. sacar un poco D. ingresos. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin D. invertir en su negocio en la compra D. variedad D. paletas y D. cosméticos que le ayuden a atraer a más clientes  D. tal manera que pueda aumentar sus niveles D. venta para así poder tener acceso a una mejor oportunidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Maricela Antonia is 64 years old and lives in her own home with her son who is now an adult. She sells different flavored popsickles and also cosmetics. 
 
Maricela is an exemplary woman who, despite her advanced age, never tires of working to get ahead and to give her family a better quality of life. She is very honest and above all enterprising. The most important thing to her is her family and because of this she asks God everyday to give her the strength to continue working so she can help them as much as possible. One of Maricela’s most notable characteristics, as noted, is that she is enterprising; she has many business ideas and does not like to let any opportunity pass by from which she might gain a little income. 

She has decided to request a loan from Integral and invest it in her business of selling different kinds of popsickles and cosmetics, which will help her to attract more customers so that she can increase her sales volume and thereby have access to better life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a variety of popsickles and of cosmetics.

loans.name: Elmer Arturo

texts.es: Elmer Arturo de 36 años de edad,  reside en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa de 32 años y sus dos hijos. Para Elmer su familia lo es todo y es por quién trabaja duramente día con día. Él se dedica a la fabricación y venta de zapatos para ambos generos y todas las edades, gustos y preferencias. Es un hombre muy trabajador el cual se ha  ganado la confianza de sus clientes gracias a su amabilidad y dedicación a la hora de hacer su trabajo. Además las personas lo prefieren ya que el siempre cuenta con variedad de zapatos y con los mejores precios si de zapatos se trata. Su sueño es ver su negocio florecer es decir poder aumentar su nivel de ventas y por consecuencia su nivel de ingresos para poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es por todo esto que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de invertir en la materia prima necesaria como: cuero, pega, nylon, y herramientas que le faciliten realizar su trabajo. Todo esto con el objetivo de mantener una mayor variedad de zapatos  que le permitan atraer a más a sus clientes de tal manera que cada día su lista de clientela sea mayor. Le pide a Dios que los resultados de su decisión sean favorables y que le permita cumplir su gran sueño.
texts.en:
36-year-old Elmer Arturo lives in his own home together with his family which consists of his 32-year-old wife and their two children.  Elmer's family mean everything to him and it is for them that he works hard day after day.  His business is making and selling shoes for both sexes and all ages, tastes and preferences.  He is a very hard-working man who has gained the trust of his customers thanks to his kindness and his commitment to his work.  In addition, people prefer to buy from him because he always has a good range of shoes available at the best prices.

Elmer's dream is to see his business flourish.  That is to say, he would like to be able to increase his sales levels, and thereby his income, so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.  For this reason, he has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL with the aim of investing in the raw materials he needs such as leather, adhesive, nylon, and the tools he needs to carry out his work.  His goal is to have a larger variety of shoes available which will enable him to attract more customers and keep increasing his customer base.  Elmer asks God for favorable results to his decision and to allow him to fulfil his big dream.

loans.use: to buy leather, adhesive, nylon and tools

loans.name: Alba Judith

texts.es:
Alba, es viuda, vive con la suegra, y tiene tres hijos de 13, 12 y 3 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de loza, inicio el negocio por la necesidad de obtener ingresos para el hogar,  ya que sus hijos dependen directamente de sus ingresos, el horario de atención es de 8:00am a 4:00pm, en ocasiones también elabora pan para vender.
Ella necesita un préstamo para comprar barro, nacazcol, leña, que son los materiales que necesita para la elaboración de loza, estos préstamos son de mucha ayuda para ella, pues ha obtenido varios y todos le han ayudado a mejorar económicamente.
Tiene por objetivo el velar por todas las necesidades de sus hijos, trabajar por ellos para que tengan una vida digna.
texts.en:
Alba is a widow living with her mother-in-law.  She has three children who are 13, 12 and 3 years old.  She makes clay cookware, a business she started because she needed to earn income for her home because her children depend directly on her income.  Her work schedule is from 8am until 4pm and sometimes she also makes bread to sell.

She needs a loan to buy clay, nacazcol (a black dye) and firewood which are the materials she needs to manufacture her cookware.  These loans are of great help to her because she’s gotten several and they have all helped her improve economically.

Her objective is to watch after all her children’s needs; to work for them so that they will have dignified lives.

loans.use: to buy clay, nacazcol and firewood.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: Petrona reside en casa alquilada junto a su grupo familiar en zona calida del país, su hogar está integrado por su esposo y dos hijos. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora, honesta y dedicada  en la actividad que realiza. Su principal inspiración es su querida familia ya que para ella lo más importante es que  su familia cuente con las mejores condiciones de vida. Petrona se dedica a la venta de verduras en un puesto que ha logrado establecer gracias a muchos esfuerzos y a la ayuda de Dios. Su negocio se encuentra ubicado en una zona comercial la cual es muy concurrida en especial el puesto de Petrona ya que ella siempre mantiene  precios accesibles y verduras de la mejor calidad y frescura. Últimamente ha notado un aumento en la demanda de sus productos y es por esto que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para comprar variedad de verduras tales como: zanahorias, cebollas, papas, tomates, yuca, y de mas productos que ayuden a atraer a más clientes. Tiene toda la confianza en Dios que logrará resultados positivos de esta decisión y podrá dar a su querida familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Petrona lives in a rented house with her family in a hot weather zone of the country.  Her home is composed of her husband and two children.  She is characterized as being a very hardworking, honest woman who is dedicated to her work.  Her main inspiration is her beloved family because for her what’s most important is that her family has the best possible living conditions.

Petrona sells vegetables in a stand she’s managed to set up thanks to much effort and with help from God.  Her business is located in a commercial zone that’s quite busy especially Petrona’s stand because she always has affordable prices and the best quality and freshest vegetables.

Lately, she’s noticed an increase in demand for her products and this is why she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy an assortment of vegetables like: carrots, onions, potatoes, tomatoes, manioc and other products that will help her attract more customers.  She has all her faith placed in God and trusts that she will attain the desired positive results from this decision and will be able to give her beloved family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
María Margarita tiene 37 años de edad es soltera, vive con la madre y con el hijo de catorce años de edad en el  Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los Miembros de la VRC Voluntad de Dios, se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad la cría, Parroquia Guanujo a una distancia de 20 minutos perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la Agricultura y ganadería.

María se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 5 cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, maíz, trigo, habas, alverja además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda

Solicita el crédito para la compra de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, líquidos para plagas, insumos y  para sembrar papas e incrementar su negocio. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando. 

Su sueño es comprarse una casa en la ciudad de Quito para que se pueda ir a estudiar el hijo y pueda vivir y no pagar arriendo. 

Le gusta las festividades del carnaval y las del sector.
texts.en:
María Margarita is 37 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother and 14-year-old son in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Voluntad de Dios' community bank is located in the community of La Cría, 20 minutes from Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, Bolívar province.  The members of this community bank work in farming and livestock raising.

María farms and raises livestock.  She owns her own home and five 'cuadras' of land.  She grows potatoes, corn, wheat, beans and peas.  She also raises animals such as pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs.  She buys and sells her products in the town of Guaranda.

María is requesting this loan to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, liquid pesticides and supplies to sow potatoes and increase her business.  The loan will support her in covering her financial needs and improving her farming activities.  She faces challenges such as the rise and fall of the prices of the products she sells and the sharp changes in the weather which we are experiencing.

María's dream is to buy a house in the city of Quito so that her son can go and study there and not have to pay rent.

María enjoys Carnival celebrations and local celebrations.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, liquid pesticides and other supplies to sow potatoes and increase her business

loans.name: Maria Bersabe

texts.es:
Doña María, vive con su esposo, tiene casa propia, se dedica a vender especias (condimentos), como achiote, pimienta, cominos en el mercado municipal.
Ella quiere diversificar su negocio y por eso está nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para que le ayuD. a comprar especias, como pimienta, comino, laurel orégano.
Su objetivo atraer a nuevos clientes para el consumo D. sus productos, mejorando así el negocio, creciendo como comerciante.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband.  She has her own house, and sells spices (condiments), such as achiote (annatto seeds), pepper, and cumin in the municipal market. 

She wants to diversify her business, and that's why she is applying for another loan, to help her buy spices such as pepper, cumin, bay leaf, and oregano. Her aim is to attract new customers for her products, and in this way improve her business, growing as a merchant.

loans.use: To buy condiments: pepper, cumin, bay leaf, and oregano for her business.

loans.name: María Inés

texts.es: María Inés D. cuarenta y dos años D. edad, resiD. en casa D. su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar el cual lo constituye su esposo y su hijo. Ella se dedica ambulantemente a la venta D. productos naturales D. marcas muy reconocidas, los cuales sirven para diferentes problemas D. salud tales como alta presión, exceso D. peso, dolores D. cabeza, falta D. vitaminas. Ya tiene mucho tiempo D. dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo ha logrado mantenerlo activo y además es muy conocida en la zona donD. resiD. y muchas personas la prefieren ya que siempre cuenta con variedad D. productos y es muy amable y dedicada en su trabajo. Ella es una mujer emprendedora la cual no le gusta estar D. brazos cruzados, tiene muchas ideas D. negocios  y siempre trata D. realizarlas con el fin D. mejorar su situación económica. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. productos naturales con el fin D. tener diversidad D. productos que permitan atraer a más clientes y por consecuencia poder aumentar su nivel D. ventas e ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
María Inés is 42, and lives in her own house with her family, consisting of her husband and son. She works selling natural health products of very well-known brands, door-to-door. These are used for different health problems such as high blood pressure, overweight, headaches, and vitamin deficiency. 

She has been working in this business for a long time now, and with hard work and God's help, she has managed to keep it busy; and she is well-known in the area where she lives. 

Many people prefer dealing with her, as she always has a variety of products; and she's very nice, and dedicated to her work. She is an enterprising woman, who doesn't like to sit back and do nothing. She has a lot of ideas for businesses and she always tries to carry them out, with the aim of improving her financial situation. 

She has decided to apply to INTEGRAL for this loan, in order to buy a variety of natural health products, with the aim of having a diverse selection of products. This will enable her to attract more customers; thereby increasing her sales volume and income, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a variety of natural health products.

loans.name: Ambar Johanna

texts.es:
Ámbar, es comerciante de lociones y cosméticos, vive con su esposo y tiene tres hijos de 5, 8 y 11 años de edad, todos los días se dedica a la venta de cosméticos aparte de eso es empleada de una empresa, donde lleva varios años de estar trabajando.
Actualmente necesita comprar un lote de mercadería como lociones, maquillajes, labiales, sombras, y más productos de belleza, esto le ayudara a mejorar el negocio y el servicio a los clientes.
Ella tiene como objetivo el montar un negocio estable, donde pueda atender a los clientes, que sea capaz de atender la demanda y mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ámbar is a lotions and cosmetics retailer, she lives with her husband and she has three children aged 5, 8 and 11. Everyday she sells cosmetics and aside from this she is also employed by a company where she has worked for several years.

She currently needs to buy a batch of merchandise such as lotions, make-up, lipsticks, eyeshadows and other beauty products. This will help her to improve her business and the service that she provides to her customers.

Her goal is to set up a stable business where she can serve customers, meet demand and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy merchandise: lotions, make-up, lipsticks and eyeshadows

loans.name: Francisca Javier

texts.es: Francisca Javier reside en casa propia junto con su pequeño nieto. Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Francisca siempre ha sido de las mujeres que nos les gusta estar sin hacer nada,  para ella el trabajo es sagrado y lo realizan con mucha dedicación. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como: aceite, huevos, frijoles, pan dulce, arroz, detergente, etc. su negocio se encuentra ubicado en lugar muy estratégico ya que es muy concurrido y accesible. Gracias al carisma y dedicación de Francisca en el trabajo ha logrado establecer una gran cantidad de clientes los cuales cada día la prefieren mas. Es una persona con muchas aspiraciones en la vida y una de ellas es poder ampliar su negocio surtiéndolo con diferentes productos de tienda de tal modo que pueda cubrir una mayor demanda para lograr mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.  Es por esto que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar  variedad de productos de tienda como: arroz, frijoles, maíz, aceite, pan dulce, golosinas, café, detergente, etc. con el objetivo de ver florecer su negocio y poder cumplir el sueño de su vida.
texts.en:
Francisca Javier lives in her own house with her small grandson.  She's worked hard for a long time to help her family get ahead in life.  Francisca has always been one of those women who don't like to be doing nothing. For her, work is sacred, and she does it with a lot of dedication. 

She sells basic households products, such as cooking oil, eggs, beans, sweet breads, rice, detergent, etc. Her business is in a very strategic location, since it is very busy and easy to access.  Thanks to her charisma and commitment to her work, Francisca has managed to attract a large number of customers, who each day prefer her more and more. 

She is a person with many goals in life, and one of them is to is to be able to expand her business, stocking it with different products. This will enable her to meet a greater demand, and thereby improve her income and quality of life. 

This is why she has decided to apply to INTEGRAL for this loan, in order to buy a variety of products for her store, such as: rice, beans, corn, cooking oil, sweet breads, candy, coffee, detergent, etc. Her objective is to see her business flourish, and in this way, fulfil her life's dream.

loans.use: To buy a variety of products for her store, such as: rice, beans, corn, cooking oil, sweet breads, candy, coffee, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Lidia Jeanette

texts.es: Lidia Jeanette de 22 años de edad, reside en casa familiar junto con su madre y hermana. Ella se dedica a la venta de deliciosas tortillas las cuales las elabora en su casa y luego las sale  a vender en el mercado central de la zona donde ella habita. La venta la realiza en un lugar muy accesible y concurrido por muchas personas en especial el negocio de Lidia ya que ella siempre cuenta con deliciosas e higiénicas tortillas a la hora 	que se necesitan. Muchas personas la prefieren por su empeño y amabilidad en su trabajo. Lidia es una joven muy trabajadora ya que a pesar de su corta edad es muy arriesgada, toma muy en serio su trabajo y es muy responsable con sus actividades. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar la materia prima como: maíz, agua, cal, gas propano, leña, etc. con el fin de dar un mejor servicio y poder ofrecer mayor cantidad de sus ricas tortillas. Espera que su nivel de ventas aumente y logre tener la oportunidad de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lidia Jeanette, age 22, lives in the family house with her mother and sister.  She sells delicious tortillas, which she makes at home.  She then sells them at the central market where she lives.  

She sells at a place that is very accessible and crowded with people.  Lidia’s business is especially busy because she always has delicious, wholesome tortillas at the time they are needed.  Many people prefer her because of the effort she puts into her work and for her kindness.

Lidia is a hard-working young woman.  In spite of her young age she is very indomitable.  She takes her work very seriously, and she is very responsible with her business activities.

She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy supplies like corn, water, lime, propane gas, and firewood, etc.  She will do this in order to give better service and to be able to sell a greater quantity of her delicious tortillas.  

She hopes that the level of her sales increases and that she will manage to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies like corn, water, lime, propane gas, and firewood, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy meats, cooking oil, vegetables, and condiments

loans.name: Sara Josefina

texts.es: Sara Josefina D. 44 años D. edad, resiD. en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar, en una colonia muy sencilla, el cual está constituido por su esposo D. 42 años y sus dos hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica a la venta D. ricas tortillas. El negocio lo ha establecido en su hogar D. residencia, lugar que es muy visitado ya que muchas personas confían en el trabajo D. Sara y les encantan las deliciosas tortillas que día con día elabora con mucha pasión y dedicación. Sara ha trabajado toda su vida para poder colaborar un poco en la economía D. su hogar y así poder dar a su familia una calidad D. vida diferente. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tortillería en la compra D. la materia prima como: maíz, agua, cal, gas propano, leña, etc.  Todo esto con el fin D. mejorar su situación económica para tener acceso a una mejor oportunidad D. vida.
texts.en: Sara Josefina, 44, lives in her own home with her family in a modest residential development. Her husband is 42 and their two children are still in school. Sara sells tortillas. Her business is located in her home and is frequented by the many people who trust her work and enjoy the delicious tortillas that she makes every day with dedication and passion. Sara has worked all her life to be able to contribute to her household's finances and give her family a higher quality of life. She maD. the decision to request this loan through INTEGRAL (Kiva Field Partner) so she could invest in her business through the purchase of raw materials such as corn, water, lime, propane gas, firewood, etc. This will allow her to improve her economic situation to have more life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as corn, water, lime, propane gas, and firewood.

loans.name: Lyndon Jonson

texts.es: Lyndon Jonson de 33 años de edad, reside en casa propia con sus dos hijas de 13 y 8 años de edad. Gracias a muchos esfuerzos y con la ayuda de Dios Lyndon ha logrado establecer una pequeña panadería en la cual elabora variedad de deliciosos panes y luego los pone a la venta. Ya tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio y muchas personas lo prefieren por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable y sobre emprendedor. Para él  no hay cosa más importante que su familia esta es la que lo impulsa día con día a levantarse muy temprano para tener listo el delicioso pan desde las primeras horas del día. Es un hombre muy decidido y ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el objetivo de invertir en su negocio en la compra de las principales materias primas como: harina, azúcar, leche, canela, aceite, etc. De tal manera que los clientes siempre encuentren la cantidad y variedad suficiente cuando lo soliciten. Espera lograr aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos que le permitan tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lyndon Jonson is 33 years old and lives in his own home together with his two daughters who are 13 and 8 years old.  Thanks to a lot of effort on his part and God's help, Lyndon has managed to set up a small bakery in which he makes and sells a variety of delicious breads.  He has been in this business for a long time and many people prefer to buy from him because he is a hard-working, responsible and, above all, entrepreneurial man.  For Lyndon, there is nothing more important than his family.  It is his family that motivates him to get up very early every day in order to get his delicious bread ready from the very earliest hours.

Lyndon is a very determined man and he has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL with the goal of investing in his business by purchasing the main raw materials he needs such as flour, sugar, milk, cinnamon, oil, etc. This means that his customers will always find enough quantity and variety of goods when they request them.  He hopes to increase his sales and his income which will allow him to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, cinnamon, oil, etc.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina tiene 52 años de edad, es comerciante, tiene dos hijas y 5 hijos, es casada, y reside en la Aldea de La Concepcion en el municipio de Juticalpa. 

Alejandrina tiene mas de 15 años de dedicarse a la elaboracion y venta de rosquillas y quesadillas. Ella aprendió de este oficio porque trabajó con una vecina que se dedicaba a lo mismo y tambien aprendió gracias a algunos cursos de panaderia que recibió en el Instituto Nacional de Formacion Profesional (INFOP). Su negocio esta instalado en su casa de habitacion y aun no tiene nombre, su horario laboral inicia a las 4:00 am y trabaja con sus dos hijas, ellas le ayudan a preparar la masa y luego estan pendiente de llevar el tiempo de que debe permanecer el producto en el horno. Luego de que sale el producto lo acomoda en una paila de plastico y sale a venderlo de casa en casa y de negocio en negocio. Ella considera que su mayor ventaja consiste en que sus productos tienen un sabor especial y que ademas es una persona amigable que simpatiza con otras personas y eso le ayuda a vender. Su sueño es tener un local en el Centro, aunque sea pequeño, para ya no andar vendiendo ambulantemente y asi llevar una vida mas tranquila ya que tiene Diabetes y aunque esta en tratamiento medico en cada vez que llega a su casa luego de haber terminado su jornada laboral diaria se siente resentida de salud. 

El prestamo que Alejandrina solicita lo necesita para comprar maiz, queso, azucar, manteca, entre otros productos, para la elaboracion de las rosquillas y quesadillas. Con el apoyo de este financiamiento ella podra obtener ganacias y cubrir sus gastos medicos y tambien ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de su hogar, ya que él se dedica a la agricultura y sus ingresos son pocos. Tambien desea hacerle una mejoras a su casa.

Alejandrina tiene varios años de recibir el apoyo de FAMA a traves del otorgamiento de prestamos que ha cancelado puntualmente y que le han ayudado a mantener su negocio activo y ha mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 52 years old, and has a business.  She has two daughters and five sons, and is married.  She lives in La Aldea de La Concepcion, in the municipality of Juticalpa. 

Alejandrina has been making and selling doughnuts and quesadillas for more than 15 years.  She learned this trade because she worked with a neighbor making the same products, and also learned thanks to several bakery courses she took at the Instituto Nacional de Formacion Profesional (INFOP). 

Her business is located in her home, and still has no name. Her work schedule starts at 4:00 am, and she works with her two daughters.  They help her to prepare the dough, and then spend the time it takes for the products to be in the oven.  Once she takes the product out of the oven, she places it in a plastic container, and takes it to sell door-to-door to homes and businesses.  She thinks that her major advantage is that her products have a special flavor, and that additionally she is a friendly person who gets on well with other people and this helps her to make sales.

Her dream is to have premises in the town center, even if they are small, so that she no longer has to sell by foot and so can have an easier life, as she has diabetes and is still undergoing medical treatment.  Every time she returns to her home after finishing her daily work, she feels resentful of her health.

The loan that Alejandrina is requesting is needed by her to buy corn, cheese, sugar, butter and other ingredients to make doughnuts and quesadillas.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to generate earnings and cover her medical costs.  She will also help her husband with the financial upkeep of the household, as he works in agriculture and has little income.  She also would like to make improvements to her home.

Alejandrina has had several years receiving support through FAMA through the provision of loans, which she has punctually paid back and which have helped her to keep her active business going and to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, sugar, butter, etc.

loans.name: Zonia Yolanda

texts.es:
Zonia, vive con su familia, tiene un hijo D. 8 años D. edad, ella administra una tienda, todos los días esta atendiéndola, sin un horario fijo, ella y su hijo depenD. D. los ingresos que le genera la tienda.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería, como jabón, detergentes, pastas, aceite, boquitas, gaseosas y jugos, estos productos le ayudaran para fortalecer el negocio, estar atenta al servicio D. los clientes.
Su propósito es que a través D. los préstamos pueda crecer, con el objetivo D. apoyar a su hijo y cubrir todas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Zonia lives with her family.  She has an 8-year-old son and runs a store.  She works in her store every day but doesn't work fixed hours.  She and her son depend on the income that she makes from her store.

Zonia is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as soap, detergents, pasta, oil, snacks, soda and juice.  These products will help her to strengthen her business and proviD. good customer service.  Her goal is to grow her business through loans.  She thereby hopes to support her son and cover his needs.

loans.use: to buy soap, detergents, pasta, oil, snacks, soda and juice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fried pork rind, cheese and cooking oil to make pupusas.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es: Jesús resiD. en su propia casa con su hija la cual ya es mayor D. edad. Ella posee un pequeño chalet en el cual venD. productos D. primera necesidad como: frijoles, pan dulce, arroz, azúcar, golosinas, detergente, entre otros. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que no se cansa D. trabajar y luchar por mejorar su situación económica y la D. su familia. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que ella es muy dedicada, amable y sobre todo responsable. Siempre atienD. a sus clientes con una sonrisa y con mucha disposición. Todo esto ha permitido que las personas le tengan confianza y la prefieran a la hora D. realizar sus compras. Jesús a decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeño negocio y poder surtirlo D. diferentes artículos D. tienda como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, golosinas, pan dulce, aceite, papel, y D. mas productos que resulten atractivos para los clientes. Confía en Dios que D. esta forma su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia cambiará.
texts.en:
Jesús lives in her own home together with her grown-up daughter.  Jesús owns a small place where she sells essential household products such as beans, sweet bread, rice, sugar, candies, detergent, etc.  She is a very hard-working woman who never tires of working and struggling to improve her own financial situation and that of her family.  She has a lot of customers as she is very dedicated, kind and, above all, responsible.  She always serves her customers with a smile and good will.  This has led to people trusting her and preferring to buy from her.

Jesús has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her small business and stock it with different goods such as rice, sugar, beans, candies, sweet bread, oil, paper and other products which appeal to her customers.  She trusts in God that, as a result, her own quality of life and that of her family will change.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, candies, sweet bread, oil, paper, etc.

loans.name: Isis Rosmeri

texts.es: Isis Rosmeri de 30 años de edad, reside en casa familiar junto a su padre de 65 años y su pequeño hijo de 7 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumería y variedad de ropa usada. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su hogar de habitación. Gracias a su carisma muchas personas la prefieren y demandan los productos que Isis vende. Hasta el momento el negocio es rentable y es su principal fuente de ingresos.  Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de comprar variedad de perfumería y ropa usada (pantalones, faldas, blusas, short, etc.), para atraer a más clientes que le permitan aumentar su nivel de ventas y de ingresos. Espera y confía en Dios que de esta manera su situación actual mejorará y logrará tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Isis Rosmeri is 30 years old.  She lives in her family home with her 65 year old father and her little 7 year old son.  She sells perfume as well as a variety of used clothing.  Her business is located in her home.  Thanks to her charisma, many people prefer her and request the products Isis sells.  Her business is her main source of income and so far, it is profitable.  She has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy a variety of perfume and used clothing (trousers, skirts, blouses, shorts, etc.) in order to attract more customers, which will allow her to increase her sales and income. She trusts in God and hopes that, in this way, her present situation will improve and she will have access to a better quality of

loans.use: to buy a variety of perfume and used clothing (trousers, skirts, blouses, and shorts).

loans.name: Nataly De La Rosa

texts.es: Nataly de la Rosa de 23 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto con su abuela de 71 años. Nataly posee una tienda en su hogar de residencia en la cual vende todo tipo de artículo de tienda como: pan dulce, aceite, golosinas, detergente, jabón, y otros productos más. Ella es muy emprendedora, tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales le gustaría echar andar en el futuro. Es muy responsable en las decisiones que toma y esta es la razón por la cual sus vecinos la prefieren ya que en su negocio siempre encuentran lo que buscan y saben que la atención que reciben es única. Este negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos de Nataly es por eso que ella siempre trata de estar un paso adelante de la competencia para que su negocio no muera y los clientes cada día sean más. Es por esa razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar  este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tienda y comprar variedad de productos como: golosinas, leche, café, frijoles, arroz, pan dulce, detergente, aceite y de mas artículos que permitan mantener surtido el negocio de tal manera que los clientes se vayan satisfechos a la hora de hacer sus compras. Espera con esta ayuda lograr tener la oportunidad de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nataly de la Rosa is 23 years old.  She lives in her family home, together with her 71 year old grandmother.  Nataly has a store in her place of residence, where she sells all types of store items like: pastries, oil, candy, detergent, soap and other additional products.  She is very entrepreneurial and has many ideas for her business which she would like to make happen in the future.  She makes very responsible decisions, and this is the reason why her neighbors prefer her business, as they can always find what they're looking for in her store and know that the attention they receive there is unique.

This business is the main source of income for Nataly; this is why she always tries to be one step ahead of the competition, so that her business doesn't die and so that each day she gets more clients.

It is for this reason that she has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL, to invest in her store and buy a variety of products such as: candy, milk, coffee, beans, rice, pastries, detergent, oil, and more items that will allow her to keep her business stocked in such a way that her clients will come away happy with their purchases.

She hopes that with this help, she will be able to take the opportunity for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products such as: candy, milk, coffee, beans, rice, pastries, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Jose Benjamin

texts.es:
José, vive con sus abuelos, su esposa y dos hijos, él es agricultor y albañil, normalmente se dedica al cultivo de maíz y cuando le buscan presta el servicio de albañilería. Su familia depende de él por eso cada día se esfuerza por dar lo mejor, actualmente necesita comprar por medio de un préstamo abono y pago de obreros.
Esta será una gran ayuda para José, ya que espera que su producción de maíz sea abúndante y pueda garantizarle a su familia la alimentación, su sueño a alcanzar es terminar de construir la vivienda.
texts.en:
José lives with his grandparents, his wife and two children.  He is a farmer and construction worker; normally he works growing corn, and when needed, he take on construction work.  His family depends on him, and so every day he strives to give them the best.  

He currently needs to buy manure and pay for workes, by means of a loan.  This will be a great help to José, as he hopes that his corn production will be abundant and he can guarantee food for his family.

His dream he would like to accomplish is to finish building his home.

loans.use: to buy manure and pay for workers.

loans.name: Zoila Esperanza

texts.es: Zoila Esperanza D. 44 D. edad, habita en su propia casa con su querido esposo D. 55 años. Ella se dedica a la venta D. comida. El negocio lo tiene establecido en su hogar D. residencia y ya tiene 5 años D. dedicarse al mismo. Gracias a Dios y a sus esfuerzos el negocio es rentable y cada día los clientes solicitan sus deliciosos platos D. comida que ella elabora con mucho amor y dedicación. Ella trabaja duramente para lograr tener acceso a una mejor oportunidad D. vida ya que por el momento su situación no es del todo bien. Zoila es una mujer muy decidida por lo que a decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar la materia prima necesaria como: verduras, arroz, azúcar, carnes, pollo, frijoles, maíz, y D. mas productos que necesite para la elaboración D. sus deliciosos platillos. Tiene la fe puesta en Dios que logrará  resultados favorables D. esta decisión y podrá cumplir su sueño D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Zoila Esperanza is 44 years old.  She lives in her own home with her beloved husband, who is 55.  She works selling food.  Her business is located in her place of residence, and she has been working in her business for 5 years already.

Thanks to God and her efforts, the business is profitable, and each day customers are requesting her delicious plates of food, which she makes with much love and dedication.  She works hard to be able to get access to better life opportunities, as currently her situation is not all good.

Zoila is a very decisive women, which is why she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the necessary raw ingredients such as: vegetables, rice, sugar, meat, chicken, beans, corn, and other products she needs to make her delicious dishes.  She has her faith fixed in God that she will achieve favorable results with this decision, and will be able to accomplish her dream of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the necessary raw ingredients, such as: vegetables, rice, sugar, meat, chicken, beans, corn, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk to process into cheese, cream and curds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to use the loan to buy material to sew uniforms.

loans.name: Ruby Esther

texts.es: Ruby  de 40 años, vive en el municipio de Soledad con su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 12 a 17 años. Allí  se dedica desde hace un poco menos de 10 años, a la producción de ropa deportiva, suéteres y blusas de franela y confección sobre medida, actividad innata que emprendió y posteriormente perfeccionó en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje “SENA”. En la actualidad su negocio depende en su mayoría del sistema de maquila, que ofrece a una empresa de confecciones; en tiempos libres elabora productos propios que vende en sectores aledaños.  Sus estados financieros muestran un buen negocio,  los ingresos en su gran mayoría provienen del servicio de maquila que presta.  En la actualidad su meta es lograr plena independencia, sueño que trabajará gradualmente,  pues aspira a   conseguir su propio mercado.  Los indicadores financieros, muestran una estabilidad en el negocio; tanto en su autonomía financiera, como  en la rotación de las materias primas, que aunado al proyecto de adecuación del local en la parte externa de la vivienda, le generaría mayor comodidad a la familia. En la actualidad su competencia es su mayor desafío para lograr un mercado mayorista, pero está trabajando en conseguirlo gradualmente. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual hará adecuaciones del área de producción de su negocio para hacer más efectivo su trabajo.
texts.en:
Ruby, 40, lives in the town of Soledad with her husband and three children ranging in age from 12 to 17 years.  For about the last ten years she’s been making sportswear, sweaters and flannel blouses there and has been making clothes to order, an innate activity that she started and then perfected taking courses at “SENA” [National Learning Center].  

Currently, her business depends for the most part on the ‘maquila’ (assembly for third parties) system that she offers a clothing manufacturing firm.  In her free time, though, she makes items for herself that she then sells in surrounding areas.  

Her financial statements show that her business is a good one.  Her income, for the most part, comes from the assembly services she provides.  Her current goal is to become totally independent, a dream she hopes to attain gradually because she hopes to acquire her own market share.  Financial indicators show business stability both in her financial autonomy and in raw materials turnover which, when added to the project to remodel the workshop located outside her house, will generate more comfort for her family.

Currently, competition is her greatest challenge to attain a wholesale market but she’s working towards attaining it gradually.  Her Kiva loan is the first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she’ll use it to do some remodeling in the business’ production area so that work will be more efficient.

loans.use: to do some remodeling to make her workshop more efficient.

loans.name: Irma Giorgina

texts.es:
