Giorgina nació en la ciudad de Urubamba de la provincia del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 54 años de edad, ella es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos, ella vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos (damas, caballeros y niños), ella no tiene un puesto de venta pero ofrece sus productos mediante catálogos, ella también se dedica a la venta de productos de la maraca Natura.   

Giorgina requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como por ejemplo zapatos y ropa. El sueño de Giorgina es abrir una ferretería. 

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Giorgina was born in the city of Urubamba, in Cusco province (Peru). She is 54, married, with three children. She lives in the city of Cusco, where she carries on her business. She sells clothing and shoes (women's, men's, children's). She doesn't have a fixed sales location, but instead sells her products through catalogues. She also sells products from the Nature brand. 

Giorgina needs the loan to buy more merchandise such as shoes and clothing. Giorgina's dream is to open a hardware store.

The members of the "Nueva Vision Urubamba" communal bank meet every thirty days in the city of Urubamba (Cusco province, Peru).  Cusco is known as a tourist and commercial area. It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, "Machu Piccchu" is located there.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise, such as shoes and clothing.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María,  vive con su familia está conformada por su esposo y dos hijos, ella tiene 56 años D. edad, su negocio es una tienda la cual la administra desD. hace 13 años, trabaja todos los días D. la semana y cuenta con la ayuda D. su esposo.
Ella nuevamente solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería (boquitas, galletas, gaseosas, jugos, pastas, jabon y detergentes), ayudando D. esta manera a surtir el negocio, a mejorar la atención a los clientes y realizar más ventas, estos préstamos considera que han sido muy útil para el desarrollo del negocio.
Para María el objetivo por el cual trabaja todos los días es que sus hijos culminen los estudios universitarios y crecer con el negocio.
texts.en:
María is 56 and lives with her husband and two children.  She runs a small store that she has managed for the past 13 years, working every day with the help of her husband.  She now seeks credit to buy merchandise such as candy, soft drinks, juices, pastas, soap and detergents.  This credit will help her to better stock her store, proviD. better service to customers and increase sales.  
AsiD. from her goal of growing her business, Maria works every day so that her children can finish their university studies.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, juices, pastas, soap and detergents.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
Florencia nació en la ciudad de Urubamba de la provincia del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 58 años de edad, ella es viuda y tiene cinco hijos, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras y alfalfa, ella lleva sus productos los días sábados a vender a la ciudad de Quillabamba. Ya son 8 años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien  gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. 

Florencia requiere el préstamo para comprar verduras, para refaccionar su casa y para pagar los estudio de su hijo que esta estudiando la carrera técnica de topografía.    

 El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Florencia was born in the city of Urubamba in Cusco province (Peru). She is 58, a widow, and has 5 children. She lives in the city where she was born, and where she carries on her business. 

She sells vegetables and alfalfa.  On Saturdays, she takes her products to sell in the city of Quillabamba.  She has worked in her business for 8 years now, and it's going very well.  Florencia needs the loan to buy vegetables, to repair her house, and to pay for her son's education. He is studying for a technical career in surveying.  

The members of the "Nueva Vision Urubamba" communal bank meet every thirty days in the city of Urubamba (Cusco province, Peru). Cusco is known as a tourist and commercial area. It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, "Machu Piccchu" is located there.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, to repair her house, and to pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 40 años de edad, él es casado y tiene dos hijos, él vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde desarrolla sus actividades, él es cocinero y tiene un pequeño negocio familiar ósea un pequeño restaurante. Ya es un año que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien  gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. 

Fredy requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo bolsa de arroz, bolsa de azúcar, carne y verduras.  
  
El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Fredy was born in the city of Quillabamba (Cusco, Peru) and is 40 years old. He is married and has two children. He lives and works in the city of Urubamba. He is a cook and has a small family business, which is a small restaurant. It has already been a year since he started the business, and it's going very well for him thanks to the hard work he has put into it. 

Fredy needs the loan to purchase supplies such as bags of rice and sugar, meat, and vegetables. 

The "Nueva Visión de Urubamba" ("New Vision of Urubamba") communal bank meets every month in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a big tourist and commercial area. It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world, is found there.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like bags of rice and sugar, meat, and vegetables

loans.name: Giovana Carmen

texts.es:
Giovana Carmen nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 36 años de edad, ella es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella tiene un pequeño restaurante donde ofrece desayuno, almuerzo y cena, ella desde hace dos años y medio que se dedica al restaurante y le va muy bien , ella tambien se dedica  a vender hamburguesas, sopas, café y extras por las madrugadas. 

Giovana Carmen requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo bolsa de arroz, bolsa de azúcar, carne y verduras.    

 El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Giovana Carmen was born in Cusco, Peru.  She is 36 years old, married and has two children.  She lives in Urubamba and this is where she operates her business.  She has a small restaurant where she offers breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  She has owned her restaurant for two and a half years and it is going very well.  She also sells hamburgers, soup, coffee, and snacks in the early mornings. Giovana Carmen is requesting the loan to buy supplies such as bags of rice and sugar, meat, and vegetables.  

The “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s New Vision) Communal Bank  meets every thirty days in Urubamba (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known as a popular tourist and commercial area.  It is also famous for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the home of Machu Pichu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as bags of rice and sugar, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Oswaldo

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su madre y tres hermanos, él trabaja cultivando maíz y frijol, junto a su madre realizan los cultivos, cuenta con experiencia en la actividad. Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprarse semilla y abono para sembrar maíz, con esto podrá realizar el cultivo y esperar que la producción sea abundante.
El objetivo de José es apoyarse de préstamos para mejorar los cultivos y contribuir de las ganancias a los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
José is a farmer, who lives with his mother and three brothers.  He works growing corn and beans.  He farms with his mother, and has experience in this area.

Currently, he is requesting a loan to buy seeds and manure for planting corn.  With this, he will be able to plant his crop and hope that his harvest is abundant.

José's objective is to use the help provided by the loans to improve his crops and contribute his earnings to the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure to grow corn.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca, tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella tiene una tienda agro veterinaria. Ya son siete años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. 

Francisca requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería insecticidas y pesticidas. 

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Francisca is 34 years old and in a common law marriage from which she has two children.  She has an agro-veterinary store.  She has had this business for seven years now, and it's going very well for her.

Francisca is requesting the loan to buy merchandise of insecticides and pesticides.

The Communal Bank “Nueva Visión de Urubamba”, ("New Vision of Urubamba"), meets monthly in Cusco, Peru.  Cusco is known for being an area with a lot of tourism and business, for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because it's the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac, en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La  socia Buenaventura; tiene 67 años D. edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 4 hijos;  la socia tiene su restaurante, en el barrio D. San Jerónimo, la socia venD. todo tipo D. extras y en este mes ella aprovecho y vendió, sus potajes porque fue el mes D. su barrio muchos pobladores D. todos los distritos D. Cusco fueron a degustar sus ricas meriendas, la socia tienD. su restaurante con su hijo y ellos desean hacer D. este una hermosa quinta restaurante, la socia también renta tiendas para negocios  a terceros, ella en esta ocasión requiere el préstamo para invertir en el restaurante, la socia comprar más mesas y sillas, también insumos como aceite, arroz, papa, entre otros D. uso diario. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. insumos y mesas, sillas para implementar el restaurante.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the communal bank “COMUZONE II”.  The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco and Department of Cusco.

The borrower, Buenaventura, is 67 years old and is married.  She has 4 children.  She has a restaurant in the neighborhood of San Jerónimo.  She sells all types of things. This month there was a festival in her neighborhood, and many people from all districts of Cusco were there to taste the delicious local food.  She took advantage of this and sold her stew there.

She runs her restaurant with her son, and they want to make it a beautiful country-style restaurant.  She also rents space to third party businesses.  She needs this loan in order to invest in the restaurant – she will buy more tables and chairs, and also supplies such as oil, rice, potatoes and others for daily use.  

The member is thankful for the support, and she promises to make her required payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in supplies, tables and chairs for her restaurant.

loans.name: Alida

texts.es:
Alida tiene 44 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de bebidas y comida, es casada, tiene una hija y tres hijos, y reside en la Colonia Trochez en el municipio de Juticalpa. 

Alida aprendió de su oficio hace 8 años y fue gracias a una de sus amigas, ya que esta tenia un puesto de comidas y la contrató. Luego de unos meses la hija de Alida le comentó que en vez de trabajar para otros debía trabajar lo suyo de manera propia. Entonces Alida un dia sintonizando la radio escuchó la publicidad de FAMA y se abocó a las oficinas a solicitar un prestamo, el cual unos dia despues le fue otorgado por Lps. 2,000 y solamente con ese poco de dinero comenzó con una venta de golosinas. Actualmente su negocio a crecido y ahora es un comedor y se llama Comedor Ingrid, trabaja sola, y su horario laboral inicia desde las 6:00 am y culmina las 4:00 pm y tiene una muy buena clientela. Su meta es llegar a tener un local propio ya que donde tiene instalado su comedor es alquilado y el costo es alto. Ademas sueña en que poco a poco su pequeño comedor se ira convirtiendo en un restaurante de comida buffet.

El prestamo que Alida solicita lo necesita para comprar refrescos, agua, jugos, verduras, salsas, carnes, pastas, pollo, embutidos, frijoles, arroz, platano, azucar, cafe, lacteos, entre otros productos necesarios para la elaboracion de las comidas. Alida confia que con el apoyo de este financiamiento pueda comprar todo lo necesario para surtir su negocio y mantenerlo activo, y que pueda obtener ganancias para cubrir los gastos mas necesarios de sus hijos y hogar.

Alida tiene mas de 5 años de trabajar con los prestamos de FAMA y siempre ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente, y con tambien ha podido ampliar su negocio y ha mejorado su vivienda.
texts.en:
Alida is 44 years old, and works selling food and drink.  She is married with one daughter and three sons, and lives in La Colonia Trochez in the municipality of Juticalpa. 

Alida learned this trade eight years ago, thanks to one of her friends who had a food stand and hired her.  Several months later Alida's daughter suggested to her that instead of working for other people, she should work for herself.  So one day Alida was tuning the radio and heard the advertisement for FAMA, and she took herself to the offices to request a loan.  Some days later, they offered her Lps.2,000, and with only this small amount of money, she started selling candy. 

Today, her business has grown and now she has a diner called "Comedor Ingrid".  She works on her own; her works schedule starts at 6 a.m. and goes till 4 p.m., and she has a very good customer base.  Her goal is to be able to have her own premises for her diner, as it's rented and the cost is high.  She also dreams that little by little her small diner will be able to be converted to a buffet restaurant.

The loan that Alida is requesting is needed by her to buy soda, water, juice, vegetables, salsa, meat, pasta, chicken, sausages, beans, rice, plantains, sugar, coffee, dairy products, among other ingredients necessary for making the meals.

Alida trusts that with the help of this financing she can buy everything necessary to stock up her business and keep it going, and that she can generate earnings to cover the most necessary expenses of her children and household.

Alida has been working with loans from FAMA for more than five years, and has always paid back her repayments punctually.  She has also been able to grow her business and improve her home.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, sausages, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar, beans and eggs for her business

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
Leonarda nació en la provincia D. Calca  del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 52 años D. edad y es casada y fruta D. esta unión tiene tres hijos, ella trabaja como asistente administrativa en el colegio General Ollanta D. la ciudad D. Urubamba desD. hace 14 años, ella también tiene otra actividad que consiste en la elaboración D. bisutería artesanal como por ejemplo collares y pulseras, ella reparte la artesanía a las vendedoras D. artesanía D. las ciudades D. Urubamba y Pisac. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. 

Leonarda requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como dijes, alambre y perlas.
 
El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión D. Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad D. Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Leonarda was born in the province of Calca, department of Cusco.  She is 52 years old, married, and has three children.  She has been working as an administrative assistant at the General Ollanta Secondary School in Urubamba for 14 years.  She also makes artisanal imitation jewelry such as necklaces and bracelets.  She distributes the crafts to artisanal vendors in Urubamba and Pisac.  She has been engaged in this activity for four years already and it is going very well, thanks to the effort she puts into her business.  Leonarda is requesting the loan to purchase materials such as charms, wire, and pearls.

The “Nueva Visión D. Urubamba” (Urubamba’s New Vision) Communal Bank  meets every thirty days in Urubamba (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known as a popular tourist and commercial area.  It is also famous for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the home of Machu Pichu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy materials such as charms, wire, and pearls.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar nació en la ciudad de Chinchero de la provincia de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú), él tiene 35 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Yucay y donde realiza sus actividades, él se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su propio carro y cubre la ruta de Cusco a Urubamba y viceversa, él pertenece a una asociación de transportistas desde hace seis años y le va muy bien, él y su esposa tienen un pequeño negocio familiar que consiste en venta de productos agro veterinarios.  

Edgar requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo  insecticidas, pesticidas, semillas y comida balanceada para animales. Su sueño de Edgar es comprar carros para brindar servicios de turísticos.  

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Edgar was born in the city of Chinchero in the province of Urubamba (Cuzco, Peru). He is 35 years old and he is in a common law marriage, from which he has two children. At present, he lives in the city of Yucay where he works. He has a transportation service with his own car and he covers the route from Cuzco to Urubamba and vice versa. He has belonged to a drivers association for six years and it has gone very well for him. He and his wife have a small family business where they sell agricultural veterinarian products.      

Edgar needs the loan to buy merchandise. For example, insecticides, pesticides, seed and balanced feed for animals. Edgar's dream is to buy cars to run a tourism service.    

The “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” [New Vision of Urubamba] communal bank meets every month in the city of Urubamba (Cuzco, Peru). Cuzco is known for having a lot of tourism, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it has one of the seven wonders of the world, “Machu Picchu”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise. For example, insecticides, pesticides, seed and balanced feed for animals.

loans.name: Manuel Felipe

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El  socio Manuel; tiene 36 años de edad, el socio es soltero; él socio tiene 2 hijos de 14, 3 años de edad;  él socio  es policía y el también se dedica  a la compra y venta de repuestos, el socio tiene su negocio de venta de autopartes y repuestos para automóviles, el socio cuando no está trabajando está administrando y atendiendo personalmente su negocio, le socio requiere le préstamo para poder ayudarse y comprar mercadería, el socio quiere invertir el crédito en la compra de repuestos para automóviles. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de repuestos de automóviles.

El  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, COMUZONE II, it is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Manuel is 36 years old, he is single and has 2 children of ages 14 and 3.  Manuel is a policeman but also buys and sells spare automotive parts.  He has his own business where he sells new and used automotive parts.  When he is not working he personally tends to his business and is requesting this loan to help out and purchase automotive parts.  He is thankful for the support offered and also commits himself to fulfill his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of automotive parts.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
Aurelia nació en la provincia de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú), ella tiene 46 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella tiene una cantina donde vende diferentes tipos de tragos y la pueden encontrar en el local a partir de las 4 de la tarde hasta altas horas de la noche, ella también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de pan de forma ambulatoria. 

Aurelia requiere el préstamo para comprar mesas para implementar su cantina. 
 
El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Aurelia was born in the province of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). She is 46 and has a common-law marriage. From this relationship, she has five children. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and where she now works. She has a pub where she sells different kinds of drinks. She can be found in her pub after 4:00 pm until late at night. She also has a small business selling bread in street markets.

Aurelia needs this loan to purchase tables for setting up in her pub.

The “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” ["New Vision of Urubamba"] communal bank meets every month in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristy area, as well as being a commercial center. It is known for its traditional Inty Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to purchase tables for setting up in her pub.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pork rinds, cheese, oil, and corn, for her pupusa business.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda nació en la provincia de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú), ella tiene 24 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en unos de los centro comerciales de la ciudad de Urubamba. Ya son cinco años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.

Hilda requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo ropa como por ejemplo jeans. El sueño de la socia es comprarse una casa.

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Hilda was born in the province of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). She is 24 and is in a common-law marriage. From this relationship, she has one child. Currently, she lives in the city where she was born and where she works. She sells clothing in one of the shopping centers of Urubamba city. She has had this business for five years and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

Hilda needs this loan to purchase merchandise such as clothing; for example, jeans. Her dream is to buy herself a house.

The “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” ["New Vision of Urubamba"] meets every month in Urubamba city (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristy area, as well as a business center. It is known for the traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as clothing; for example, jeans.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela nació en la provincia de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú), ella tiene 29 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella es ama de casa y su esposo Constantino se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte interprovincial de la ruta de Cusco a Ollantaytambo y viceversa en su propio carro. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Mariela requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. 

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Mariela was born in the province of Urubamba (Cuzco, Peru). She is 29 years old and in a common law marriage from which she has one son. At present, she lives in the same city where she was born and where she works. She is a housewife and her husband Constantino works in interprovincial transportation on the route from Cuzco to Ollantaytambo and vice versa in his own car. He has had this business for two years and it is going very well for him, thanks to his hard work.  

Mariela needs the loan for car maintenance. 

The “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” [New Vision of Urubamba] communal bank meets every month in the city of Urubamba (Cuzco, Peru). Cuzco is known for its tourism, its trade, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because in it is one of the seven wonders of the world, “Machu Picchu”.

loans.use: to do car maintenance.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet nació en la ciudad de Yucay (Cusco, Perú), ella tiene 35 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde realiza sus actividades, ella es profesora y trabaja en el colegio “Arco Iris” en el nivel primaria. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este oficio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Yanet también se dedica  a la venta y compra de frutas del valle de Lares o de La Convención. 

En esta oportunidad Yanet requiere el préstamo para comprar más frutas como por ejemplo naranjas, plátanos, piñas y otras cosas más.  

El Banco Comunal “Nueva Visión de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco,  Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Yanet was born in the city of Yucay ( Cusco, Peru), she is 35 years old and has a child with her partner from a common law marriage.  She currently lives in the city of Urubamba where she carries out her day-to-day activities.  She is a teacher and works at the Arco Iris elementary school; she has been working there for 2 years and it is going well for her thanks to her determination at work.  Yanet also sells fruit and purchases it from Lares Valley or La Convencion.

For this opportunity, Yanet request the loan to purchase more fruit such as: oranges, bananas, and pineapples as an example, and other things.

The communal bank, Nueva Vision de Urubamba ( New Vision of Urubamba), meets every 30 days in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known as a tourist and commercial area as well as for its traditional celebration Inti Raymi and also because it is located amongst one of the 7 wonders of the world, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit such as: oranges, bananas, pineapples, and other things.

loans.name: Manuel Alexis

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su esposa, sus padres y un hermano, en su familia todos trabajan; él es empleado de un banco, su horario es de 8:00am a 7:00pm, él está por segunda vez solicitando un préstamo que esta hoy lo necesira para la reparacion de una motocicleta, que le permita desplazarse a su trabajo con mayor facilidad.
Este préstamo le ayudara para tener más accesibilidad al trabajo, ya que será una inversión que le ayudara para transporte. El objetivo de Manuel es poco a poco a través de préstamo ir mejorando su calidad de vida y en un futuro tener su propio hogar.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his wife, his parents, and his brother.  In his family everyone works.  He works at a bank from 8AM to 7PM and is requesting, for the second time, a loan that would be used to repair his motorcycle which allows him to get to work with ease.  
This loan would help him have better access to his employment since the investment would aide in his transportation.  Manuel's objective is to use loans little by little to steadily improve his quality of life and in the future have his own place.

loans.use: to repair a motorcycle for personal use.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con su esposo y una hija D. 26 años que actualmente está estudiando, Rosa se dedica a vender pupusas desD. hace 5 años, este negocio lo inicio por cuenta propia, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 12:00pm. 
Por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para comprar maíz, leña, gas, chicharrón y quesillo, aceite y tomates,  estos materiales para preparar la venta, este préstamo le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y a atender mejor a los clientes.
Ella quiere crecer con el negocio, tener satisfechos a los clientes con los productos que venD., y ofrecer a su familia una mejor condición D. vida.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her husband and a 26-year-old daughter who is currently studying.  Rosa has been selling pupusas for 5 years.  She started her business on her own initiative and works from 6.00am to 12.00pm.

Right now, Rosa is requesting a loan to buy corn, firewood, gas, pork rinds, soft cheese, oil and tomatoes.  She will use these materials to prepare her products for sale.  This loan will help her to strengthen her business and better serve her customers.

Rosa would like to grow her business and keep her customers satisfied with the products that she sells.  She would like to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for making her pupusas (corn, firewood, gas, pork rinds, soft cheese, oil and tomatoes)

loans.name: Adan Elias

texts.es:
Adan Elias tiene 47 años de edad es casado, vive con la esposa y los dos hijos de diecinueve y diecisiete años de edad en el  Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los Miembros de la VRC Voluntad de Dios, se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad la cría, Parroquia Guanujo a una distancia de 20 minutos perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la Agricultura y ganadería.

Adan se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 10 cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, maíz, trigo, habas, alverja además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, líquidos para plagas, insumos y  para sembrar papas e incrementar su negocio. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando. 

Su sueño es tener buenos ingresos y dar a los hijos para que culminen los estudios superiores y gozar de salud para poder seguir adelante, ampliar su producción, tener una vida tranquila. 
Le gusta las festividades del carnaval y las del sector.
texts.en:
Adán Elías, 47, is married living with his wife and two children who are 19 and 17 years old in Guaranda Canton, Bolívar Province.

The members of the “Voluntad de Dios” (God’s Will) communal bank are located in the community of La Cría, Guanujo Parish twenty minutes away and belonging to Guaranda Canton.   They are farmers and raise livestock.

Adán works farming and raising livestock.  He owns his house and ten cuadras (unit of land area) of land and grows potatoes, corn, wheat, lima beans and peas; he also raises several species of animals like pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs.  He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda.

He requests the loan to buy manure, seeds, fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides and to plant potatoes and increase business.  The loan will help him meet his economic needs and improve his farming activities.  He faces challenges like the fluctuation in prices of the products he sells as well as the brusque weather changes we are experiencing.

His dream is to earn good income to give his children so that they will complete their higher education and to enjoy good health so that he can continue expanding production and have a tranquil life.  He enjoys Carnival and the local festivals.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac, en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La  socia Paulina; tiene 51 años D. edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 1 hijo ; la socia trabaja en una entidad pública D. Salud, la socia trabaja más D. 20 años y a incorporado a sus vida un negocio alterno, que le permite crecer económicamente, la socia se encarga D. distribuir zapatos a sus compañeros D. trabajo, la socia hace pedido a su padre y familia que trabaja con ella y piD. en series zapatos para el personal D. trabajo según el área que tienen, la socia también ofrece zapatos para los hijos y parejas D. los trabajadores dejándoles a precios cómodos y en plazos D. dos parte a pagar. La socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y requiere el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra D. otro grupo D. pedidos, la socia dará el pago anticipado a los proveedores para que ella pueda realizar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. zapatos para repartir.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the "COMUZONE ii" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Paulina is 51 years old, married, and has one child.  She has worked for a public health company for more than 20 years.  Paulina has added an alternative business to her life which allows her to grow financially.  She sells shoes to her work colleagues.  Paulina places orders with her father and other family members who work with her and requests shoes for her work colleagues.  She also sells shoes to the children and partners of the people she works with, selling at affordable prices and on credit.  Paulina is a very hard-working woman who needs this loan to invest in buying merchandise.  She will pay her suppliers in order to stock her business.  Paulina is requesting this loan to buy shoes with which to stock her business.

Paulina is grateful for the support that she will receive and therefore pledges to to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Blanca Yanira

texts.es:
Blanca, se dedica a la venta de ropa y oro,  vive con su esposo, ella comercializa sus productos en todo el oriente del país, visitando los pueblos y cantones, este negocio surgió por necesidad.
Actualmente está por segunda vez solicitando un préstamo, para la compra oro: cadenas, aretes, argollas, anillos, entre otros, esta inversión contribuirá a mejorar el negocio generándole mayores ganancias.
El objetivo que pretende alcanzar es que por su esfuerzo, algún día logre comprarse su propia casa, ya que actualmente esta alquilando.
texts.en:
Blanca sells clothing and gold and lives with her husband. She sells her products throughout the eastern region of the country, visiting towns and villages. This business came out of necessity.  

Currently this is the second time she's asking for a loan to buy gold: chains, earrings, two types of rings, etc. This loan will help the business generating better profits for her. 

The goal that she aims for is that through her effort one day she will buy herself her own home since now she is renting.

loans.use: to buy gold: chains, earrings, two types of rings, etc.

loans.name: Vilma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Vilma, se dedica  a la venta D. plásticos, loza y otros productos del hogar, vive con su madre y una hija D. 26 años D. edad, ella administra el negocio desD. hace 20 años, surgió por iniciativa propia, lo atienD. todos los días D. 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella necesita un préstamo, este será el segundo, para la compra D. productos como lazos, platos, pelotas, y más productos plásticos, con la inversión lograra mejorar el negocio, y superarse con sus ganancias. El objetivo D. Vilma es que su hija se pueda superar con los estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Vilma sells plastic products (tableware and other household products).  She lives with her mother and her 26-year-old daughter.  Vilma has been running her business for 20 years.  She set up her business on her own initiative and serves in it from 7.00am to 4.00pm every day.

Vilma needs her second loan to buy products such as tableware, dishes, balls, etc.  With this investment she will improve her business and increase her profits.  Vilma's goal is for her daughter to do well in her university studies.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (tableware, dishes and balls)

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro, es empleado de un juzgado, vive con su esposa y un hijo, posee casa propia, tiene 12 años de trabajar y a parte de este también realiza labores agrícolas, por el momento necesita comprar insumos agrícolas para cuidar el cultivo, por ejemplo abono y herbicidas, que le ayudan para fortalecer la planta y prevenirla de plagas.
Esta será una gran ayuda para él, espera tener una producción sana y apoyar a su familia en todo lo posible, además de administrar bien este préstamo por ser el primero.
texts.en:
Pedro works as a court employee.  He lives with his wife and son in his own home.  He has been working in this job for 12 years and also carries out farming work.  Right now, Pedro needs to buy farm supplies with which to care for his crops such as manure and herbicides.  This will help him to strengthen his crops and prevent pests.

This loan represents a great help for Pedro.  He hopes to achieve a healthy production and support his family in so far as he can.  He also hopes to manage this loan well as it is his first.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides for his crops

loans.name: Angel Israel

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El  socio Angel; tiene 64 años de edad, el socio es casado; él socio tiene 5 hijos de  los cuales solo vive con el menor que aun es estudiante, el socio trabaja en este banco desde hace 9 años siempre pago puntualmente y es un socio muy querido dentro del grupo, el socio  se dedica a comprar  calzados de vestir en la ciudad de  Trujillo y los vende en Cusco, el socio trae zapatos para damas, caballeros, niños según su lista de pedidos, el socio en la ciudad de Cusco tiene sus clientes fijos como él los llama y una vez que realiza el pedido  el socio viaja a la ciudad de Trujillo compra y le envía a Cusco los zapatos el recoge y reparte. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de Zapatos.

El  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “COMUZONE II” communal bank, which is located in the District of Huanchac, in the Province of Cusco and the Department of Cusco.

The member, Angel, is 64 years old.  He is married, and has five children, of whom he lives with only the youngest, as he is still a student.  The member has been working with this bank for the last 9 years, he always pays punctually and is a beloved member in the group.  

The member works buying shoes in the city of Trujillo, and sells them in Cusco.  The member brings shoes for women, men, and children according to his order list.  The member has loyal clients in the city of Cusco who call him, and once he has the order, the member travels to the city of Trujillo, buys the shoes and brings them back to Cusco, where he distributes them and collects payment.

The member will invest the loan in buying shoes.

The member is grateful for the help being offered to him, and similarly, he promises to comply in a disciplined way with his repayments.

loans.use: to invest in buying shoes.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Doña Juana es comerciante, tiene su propio negocio que junto a sus tres hijos ha salido adelante, hoy en dia todos mayores.
Su negocio es la venta de zapato y una farmancia, el cual ella ve la tienda de zapatos y su hijo la farmacia. Es a si que han salido adelante.
Pues al iniciar lo hizo con poco capital, de su trabajo, luego con financiameinto en Adodenic logra introducir variedad y estilo de zapatos, y comienza a crecer, logrando captar clientela, ventas altas, y alquiler del modulo donde vende.
Lleva siete ciclos trabajado con Afodenic, hoy con este nuevo prestamo, es para cambiar techo de su casa, poner piso y reparar baño, comprando uno nuevo.
Lo que comprara materiales en laminas de zinc, golosos, perlines, piso, cemento, arena, inodoro y sus accesorios, logrando una mejor vivienda para su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Juana is a businesswoman.  She has her own business that has helped her move ahead in life, together with her three children, who are today all grown.

Her business is selling shoes and and a pharmacy; she looks after the shoe store, and her son takes care of the pharmacy.  This is how they have been able to move ahead in life.

To begin with, she did it with little capital from her work; later on, with financing from Afodenic, she was able to introduce more variety and styles of shoes, and started to grow, achieving new clients, higher sales, and renting the space from where she sells.

She has been working with Afodenic for seven lending cycles.  This new loan today is for replacing the roof of her house, putting down a floor, and repairing the bathroom and buying a new toilet.

What she will buy are materials - zinc sheets, bolts, roof beams, flooring, cement, sand, a toilet and accessories - achieving a better home for her family.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home, replacing the roof and floor and buying a new toilet, achieving better hygiene conditions for her family.

loans.name: Laura Nelida

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Laura; tiene 53 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo vive con los 2 últimos, la socia los apoya en los estudios, la socia se dedica  a la administración, cobro y promoción de sus pequeña empresa, la socia es miembro activo del banco desde hace 7 años atrás y con los que ha podido ahorrar y sacar préstamo del banco en la misma modalidad ella ha invertido en su empresa de luces y sonido junto a sus hijos, la socia trabaja ofreciendo con una tarjeta sus servicios de luces y sonido a los diferentes eventos en la ciudad y en provincias, la socia también está el último año de sus carrera profesional de Contabilidad este negocio el abrió la oportunidad de estudiar Contabilidad para ella misma hacer las cuentas de su negocio, la socia desea invertir en la compra de parlantes, luces,  música actual, micrófono nuevo y seguir mejorando su servicio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de luces, micrófonos nuevo, parlante y música.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Comuzone II” Communal Bank, located in the district of Huanchac, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.  
Laura is 53 years old.  She is unmarried and has five children.  The two youngest children live with her and she supports them with their education.

 She is engaged in the administration, collection of accounts receivable, and promotion of her small business.  She has been an active member of the communal bank for the past seven years.  Membership has enabled her to save and take out loans from the bank.  Through the same means, she has invested in her light and sound business. With the help of her sons, she distributes business cards offering her light and sound services for various events in the city and the provinces.  

She is also in her last year of study for her professional accounting degree. This business presented the opportunity to study accounting so that she could handle the bills herself. Laura wishes to invest in the purchase of speakers, lights, the latest music, and a new microphone in order to improve her service.  She is requesting the loan to purchase lights, new microphones, speakers, and music.

Laura is grateful for the support offered and also promises to make her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy lights, microphones, speakers, and music.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 43 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia en la cual radica desde hace 6 años.Tiene 8 años de  experiencia en ventas de comida en un centro educativo cercano a su casa. Vende todos los días que hay clases y descansa los fines de semana. En esta  tarea de atender a los clientes cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos y en ocasiones su esposo, mientras ella sirve los platos. Su puesto de ventas es un cafetín donde no solo vende comida sino también golosinas para los niños que estudian que son sus principales consumidores lo cual le permite tener más ganancias. Julia tiene metas en concreto para su negocio y se ha decidido implementar su local de ventas para que funcione en mejores condiciones.Es la quinta vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP  en todo este tiempo que ha solicitado crédito en un inicio de manera grupal ha demostrado su puntualidad en el pago de sus cuotas. Y en esta ocasión su dinero lo invertirá en la compra de  nuevos cubiertos y mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en:
Julia is 43 years old.  She lives with her husband and her three children in her own house, where she has resided for the last six years.  

She has eight years of experience selling food at an education center near to her home.  She works every day that there are classes, and rests on the weekends.  She has the help of her children, and occasionally her husband, in tending to the customers, while she serves the food.  Her sales location is a cafe where she doesn't just sell food, but also candies for the children students who are her main consumers; this allows her to have more earnings.

Julia has concrete goals for her business, and has decided to put them in place at her sales premises so that she works in better conditions.

This is the fifth time that she is requesting a loan through MFP.  In all this time that she has requested loans, initially as part of a group, she has demonstrated punctuality in making her repayments.  And on this occasion, the money will be invested in the purchase of new silverware and merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of new silverware and merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Esfuerzo Y Voluntad Group

texts.es:
Laureano es un microempresario de 50 años de edad, casado, tiene 4 hijas y dos hijos, y reside en la Colonia Quimica en el municipio de San Francisco de Yojoa.

Don Laureano inició con sus actuales negocios en el año de 1999, ya que junto a su esposa tenian unos ahorros y decidieron invertirlos en una pulperia y en la compra de un auto usado para ponerlo a trabajar como taxi, ya que si decidian dejar los ahorros en el banco poco a poco los irian gastando y se iban a quedan sin nada. Su esposa lo ayuda con la pulperia mientras él se dedica a taxear. Su pulperia esta aperturada desde las 6:00 am hasta las 9:00 pm. El manejo de sus negocios lo aprendio con la puesta en practica de los mismos y gracias a Dios no ha tenido grandes dificultades. 

El prestamo que Laureano solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de lacteos, pollo, churros, arroz, azucar, maseca, cafe, dulces, frijoles, entre otros productos necesarios para el consumo diario de las familias. Con el apoyo de este financiamiento Don Laureano podra surtir su pulperia y ofrecer mas variedad de productos a sus clientes y con esto sus ventas aumentaran dejandole ganancias, aunque a veces tiene problemas de dinero porque algunas de sus ventas las da al credito y le quedan mal con los pagos.

Su meta es tener un mini-mercadito que le sea muy rentable para darle una mejor condicion de vida a su familia. Este es su primer credito en FAMA y espera cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Laureano is a micro-entrepreneur who is 50 years of age.  He is married and has four daughters and two sons.  They reside in Colonia Quimica in the town of San Francisco de Yojoa.

Don Laureano started his current businesses in 1999.  He and his wife had some savings, so they decided to invest the money in a general store and the purchase of a used automobile for use as a taxi.  If left in a bank, their savings would earn very little.  They would eventually spend it all and be left with nothing.  His wife helps with managing the store while he is in charge of driving the taxi.  Their store is open from 6am to 9pm.  Laureano has learned to manage his businesses through on-the-job experience.  Thankfully, he has not had any major difficulties.

The loan Laureano is requesting will be invested in the purchase of dairy products, chicken, donuts, rice, sugar, cornmeal, coffee, candy, beans, and other necessary products that are part of the daily family diet.  With the help of this loan, Don Laureano will be able to restock his store and offer a wider variety of products to his customers.  As his S. increase, so will his earnings.  Sometimes he has cash flow problems because some his customers are extended credit for their purchases and are slow with their payments.  

His goal is to have a mini-market that is profitable so that he can provide better living conditions for his family.  This is Laureano’s first loan with FAMA and he hopes to complete his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Eufemia Nicolasa

texts.es:
Doña Eufemia, tiene su propio negocio, una minilibrerias en su casa de habitacion, tambien es jubilidada, en donde recibe su pension. Sus hijos son mayores e independiente.
Durante diez ciclos ha venido trabajando con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado, en donde ha logrado las mejoras a su vivienda, con el credito anterior reparo su muro de atrás, hoy con este nuevo financiamiento, seguira levantando pared al lado sur y continuar cerando un cuarto, materiales a comprar: laminas de zinc, hierro, piedra, cemento, hierro entre otros materiales a necesitar para comenzar la obra. Que solo por este medio le es posible ya que equilibra los gastos.
texts.en:
Doña Eufemia has her own business, a mini-bookstore that she manages out of her home. She is also retired and receives a pension. Her children are grown and independent.

During the ten loan cycles in which she has worked with AFODENIC, Eufemia has been able to make improvements to her home. With her previous loan, she was able to repair the wall at the back of her house. Today, with this new loan, she will continue with the work on the south wall and finish the enclosure of a room. She will buy materials such as sheets of zinc, iron, stone, cement, and other supplies that are needed to complete the work. Utilizing a loan is the only possible way for her to spread out her expenses.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for completing a room.

loans.name: Bernia

texts.es:
Bernia tiene 53 años D. edad, es felizmente casada y vive con su esposo en su casa propia dentro D. su tierra natal 
VenD. dulces y arrienda cuartos en su casa desD. hace 10 años, tiene su casa amplia que le permite realizar ambos negocios, junto con su esposos administran las ganancias  que les permite  tener mensualmente para los gastos D. su casa,  la clave D. su negocio es tener siempre a la mano la mercadería que necesita y tener inquilinos honestos porque ya tuvo malas experiencias D. algunos D. los inquilinos que se retrasaban en los pagos, en la actualidad  considera que tiene el privilegio detener inquilinos honestos y esto le da ánimos para mejorar la infraestructura D. su casa y su venta D. dulces. 
Es la primera vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP, se entero D. esta institución por medio D. un folleto informativo que ha recibido, esto le llamo la atención y podido información sobre las condiciones D. crédito a las cuales decidió afrontar 
Con el dinero  va a comprara bolsas D. cemento que le servirá para pavimentar los cuartos que alquila.
texts.en:
Bernia is 53 years old and happily married. She and her husband live in their own home located in the place where she was born.

Bernia has been selling candy and renting out rooms in her home for 10 years. Her house has ample space for conducting both businesses. She and her husband earn enough income each month to cover the household expenses. The key to her businesses is always having merchandise on hand and doing business with honest tenants. In the past, she has had bad experiences with a few tenants who fell behind on their payments. Bernia considers it a privilege to have honest tenants, so she is motivated to make improvements to the infrastructure of her house and her candy store.

This is the first loan she is requesting from MFP. Bernia learned about the organization through a brochure she received, which brought to her attention the information about the credit terms. As a result, she decided to take action. The money she requested will be used to purchase bags of cement for paving her rental rooms.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement for paving her rental rooms.

loans.name: Miryan Isidra

texts.es:
Miryan de 37 años hace 3 años recibió un bono, el cual lo aprovechó y quiso administrar su propio negocio, una despensa en donde tiene de todo un poco en lo que a viveres se refiere.
Aqui ella se siente muy productiva para poder ayudar en los gastos de su hogar, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos y que son excelentes estudiantes en escuelas fiscales. 

Ella se levanta muy temprano envia a sus niños a estudiar y continua con la atención de la despensa. No ha tenido problemas en el sector para desempeñar su labor. Al momento ella desea gestionar un préstamo el cuas es para comprar viveres tales como arroz, enlatados, bebidas etc. Su objetivo a mediano plazo es hacer mas visible el negocio a los clientes para esto deberá contruir y hacerlo mas grande.
texts.en:
Three years ago, Miryan took advantage of a bonus she received to start her own business. She manages a food pantry that has a little bit of everything in terms of provisions. Miryan says she feels very productive in her business since she is able to help with the household expenses. She is a single mother and has four children who are excellent public school students.

She wakes up very early so that she can send her children to school before managing her food pantry. Miryan has not encountered any problems in her line of work. At the moment, she is requesting a loan to buy provisions such as rice, canned goods, beverages, and other items. Her goal in the midterm is to make her business more visible to customers so that it will can get bigger.

loans.use: to buy rice, canned goods, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Janina Claudina

texts.es:
En el Barrio Santa Isabel (Localidad de Isla Trinitaria en Guayaquil) reside Janina de 21 años que fue motivada por su cuñada a vender mercadería como ropa, perfumes (AVON), y joyas (Yanbal), además lo que le gusto es que de acuerdo a sus ventas puede ganar premios como electrodomésticos, sabanas, tv etc. Ella trabaja de lunes a domingo de 8:30 a 19:00 pm.
Está casada con Héctor que es albañil y tienen un hijo de 8 meses. En sus recorridos a vender sus productos ha pasado inconvenientes como asaltos, pero eso no la desanima ya que debe seguir luchando. Ellos quieren un crédito para comprar perfumes, ropa y bisutería, además quisiera tener un local propio en su casa y poder compartir con su pequeño hijo más tiempo.
texts.en:
Janina is 21 years old and lives in the neighborhood of Santa Isabel, which is located in the Isla Trinitaria section of Guayaquil. She was encouraged by her sister-in-law to sell merchandise such as clothes, Avon perfumes, and Yanbal jewelry. Janina enjoys making sales because she is able to win prizes such as appliances, bedding, TVs, and other items. She works Monday through Sunday from 8:30am to 7pm.

Janina is married to Héctor, who works as a mason. They have an eight-month-old son. She has been assaulted before while traveling to make her sales, but this has not discouraged her from continuing to strive in her work. Janina is requesting a loan to buy perfumes, clothing, and jewelry. She would like to have her own shop in her house so that she can spend more time with her young son.

loans.use: to buy to buy perfumes, clothing, and jewelry.

loans.name: Laura Sebina

texts.es:
Laura de 30 años, empezó con una carreta de comidas rápidas, la cual aun mantiene para vender los fines de semana. Luego poco a poco empezó a comprar sillas, mesas cuando logró reunir un dinero.
Su trabajo lo realiza con 2 ayudantes de cocina, y su horario es de 18:00  hasta 12:00 am ósea parte de la tarde. El sector donde tiene su local fue pavimentado recientemente y esto le ha ayudado para aumentar sus ventas. Laura es  madre soltera tiene 2 hijos estudiantes y 1 que todavía es un bebé.
Para seguir su negocio Laura necesita un préstamo y comprar carne, pollo, pescado y utensilios de cocina.
A largo plazo entre sus planes está agrandar su negocio y  que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Laura is 30 years old and has a fast food cart that she maintains so that she can sell on the weekends. Gradually over time, she began buying chairs and tables whenever she had the money. She completes her work with the help of two kitchen assistants. Her schedule is from 6pm to midnight.

The area where she sets up shop was recently paved, which has helped to increase her sales. Laura is a single mother with two children in school and another who is still a baby. To move her business forward, Laura needs a loan to buy meat, chicken, fish, and cooking utensils. Her long-term plans include expanding her business and helping her children with their studies.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, fish, and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase plastic bags and a variety of chili peppers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish to sell and thread for making fishing nets.

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y venta de cosméticos por catalogo y administra una tienda móvil, esta tiene 16 años de existir, vive en su propia casa con su esposo y un hijo, con estos ingresos ha logrado mantener a su familia.
Actualmente solicita préstamo para la compra de productos para la tienda, como detergentes, azúcar, aceite, frijoles y arroz, esta compra le ayudara para aumentar el inventario, con el propósito de mejorar las ventas y los ingresos familiares.
El objetivo de ella es que a través de préstamos se pueda superar con una mejor atención a los clientes.
texts.en:
Ana sells used clothing and cosmetics through catalogs. She has also managed a mobile store for the past 16 years. Ana lives in her own home with her husband and son. With her income, she has been able to sustain her family.

At the moment, Ana is requesting a loan to buy products for her store such as detergents, sugar, oil, beans, and rice. This purchase will help increase her inventory so that she can improve her sales and the family income.

Her goal is to utilize these loans so that she can provide better service to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her mobile store.

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es:
Benigno de 53 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

La actividad que desarrolla Benigno es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra café y cacao, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su casa. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así mejorar económicamente.  Benigno es un hombre que se preocupa por que su negocio mejore y tenga algunas comodidades para ofrecerle a su esposa.
texts.en:
Benigno is 53, and lives with his family in their own house, which has both water and electricity. It is located in Oyotún district, which is part of Chiclayo province. This area is known for farming and livestock-raising. 

Benigno is a farmer, and has his own land, where he grows coffee and cacao. Once he harvests his crops, he sells them in the different markets of Chiclayo, and in this way he is able to earn income to cover his household costs.  

He has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles, in order to buy fertilizers to improve his land and crops.  His aim is to sell them at a better price to the merchants, and thereby improve his finances. 

Benigno is a man who is concerned about improving his business, and having a few home comforts to offer his wife.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve his land and crops.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel de 49 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

Daniel desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (gallinas y patos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su familia.  También cuenta con tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y una vez que cosecha lo comercializa teniendo otro para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar de alimento para engordar a sus animales y fertilizante para mejorar sus tierras, al igual que su producto y así venderlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes, con esos ingresos podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida. Daniel es una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo que lo único que quiere es poder brindarle algunas comodidades a su familia y que logren sus ideales.
texts.en:
Daniel is 49 years old.  He lives with his wife and children in his own home, which only has electricity service (no running water).  It is located in the rural area of the Tambogrande district, which belongs to the department of Piura.  This area is characterized by its agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

For the last several years, Daniel has been working raising and selling farmyard poultry (chickens and ducks).  His farmyard is located in the area behind his house, which is fully suitable for this purpose.  He feeds them with balanced feed and natural grains, so that his poultry will reach an optimal size.  Then he can offer them for sale in the different markets in the area, and so obtain very good earnings to cover the daily expenses of his family.  He also has some agricultural fields where he grows lemons, and once they have been harvested, he sells them from his house.

He has requested a loan of 1,000 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa for buying feed to fatten his poultry, and fertilizer to improve his fields and his crop, and so sell them to his customers for a better price.  With these income sources, he will be able to pay back his loan and improve his quality of life.

Daniel is someone who is very dedicated to his work, as the only thing he wants is to be able to provide several comforts for his family, and to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy more balanced feed for his poultry, and fertilizer to improve his agricultural fields

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 18, 23 y 25 años de edad, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cultivo de maíz, frijol y jícama,  este negocio tiene 20 años de tenerlo, trabaja todos los días de la semana de 6:00am a 3:00pm, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre.
Él Nuevamente solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y herbicidas, esta compra le ayudara para que él le brinde los cuidados necesarios al cultivo de maíz, frijol y jícama, ya que aumentara la producción para tener una mejor ganancia de la comercialización de estos.
El objetivo de Isidro es mantenerse en el negocio, cubrir las necesidades del hogar y trabajado junto a su familia para progresar.
texts.en:
Isidro lives with his wife and 3 children, ages 18, 23, and 25.  He raises cattle, and grows corn, beans and jicama.  He has had his business for 20 years. He works every day of the week from 6:00am to 3:00pm. He learned this trade from his father. 

He is applying for another loan, in order to buy fertilizer and herbicides. This purchase will help him to provide the necessary care for his corn, bean and  jicama crops. He hopes to increase his production to have better profits from selling them. 

His goal is to support himself through his business; to cover his household costs, and to work alongside his family to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides for growing corn, beans, and jicama.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, administra una tienda D. productos domésticos, vive con su esposo quien trabaja D. repartidor D. gaseosas, juntos ven la manera D. proveer ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos que son tres, su horario es D. 7:00am a 6:00pm.
Nuevamente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. productos comestibles como, sodas, jugos, pastas, embutidos y huevos, esta compra será una gran ayuda para surtir el negocio y generar más ingresos.
Los sueños y aspiraciones D. María son crecer a sus hijos y que estudien, además D. tener un negocio que cada día le provea más ganancias.
texts.en:
María manages a home product store.  She lives with her husband, who works as a soda delivery man.  Together they see their way to providing income and supporting their three children.  Her schedule is from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m.

She is currently requesting a loan for the purchase of edible items, such as soda, juice, pasta, sausages and eggs.  This purchase will be a great help in stocking her business and generating more income.

María's dreams and hopes are to raise her children, and that they attend school.  Additionally, to have a store that every day provides her with more earnings.

loans.use: to buy soda, juice, pasta, sausages, and eggs for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a variety of groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy firewood, clay, and nacazcol (dye) to make griddles and pots.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, es comerciante de verduras y frutas, también pescado, vive con su esposa, él aprendió el negocio porque trabajo como ayudante, con la experiencia que adquirió decidió instalar su propio negocio con muchos años de experiencia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas: sandia, bananos, uvas, tomate, plátanos, papas, estos productos le ayudaran para mantenerse en el negocio, con la oportunidad de generar mayores ganancias.
El propósito de él es tener el negocio surtido, para atender la demanda, también ampliarse hacia otros mercados con puntos de venta.
texts.en:
José sells fruits, vegetables and fish. He lives with his wife.

He learned the business because he worked as an assistant. With the many years of experience he acquired, he decided to open his own business.

He is now asking for a loan to buy fruits: watermelon, bananas, grapes, tomatoes, plantains and potatoes. These products will help him maintain his business and give him the chance to generate higher earnings.

José's goal is to have a well-stocked store to satisfy demand. He also wants to expand into other markets with points of sale.

loans.use: to buy watermelons, bananas, grapes, tomatoes, plantains and potatoes for his business.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Arca De Noe Group

texts.es: El banco comunal llamado Arca De Noé está conformado por Josefa, Marcela Zenayda, Jasmina Del Carmen, Adriana Esperanza, Martha Del Socorro, Blanca Nubia, Gladis Del Rosario y Deyanira. Ellas son mujeres muy responsables que disfrutan de obtener un medio de vida para salir adelante. En el caso de Martha se dedica a la venta de tortillas, desde hace más de 6 años, que la mayoría de sus vecinos, amigos y familiares saben la buena calidad de tortillas que ofrece. El financiamiento es para la compra de maíz, comal, cal, bolsas entre otros.
texts.en:
The Arca De Noé (Noah's Ark) communal bank is made up of Josefa, Marcela Zenayda, Jasmina Del Carmen, Adriana Esperanza, Martha Del Socorro, Blanca Nubia, Gladis Del Rosario and Deyanira. They are very responsible women who enjoy having a way to make a living and move forward.

Martha has sold tortillas for more than six years. Most of her neighbors, friends and relatives know that she offers high-quality tortillas for sale. The loan is for purchasing corn, a comal (tortilla griddle), lime and bags, as well as other items.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, a comal (tortilla griddle), bags and other items.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro tiene 44 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y su hijo en su casa propia desde hace 7 años viene radicando después de mudarse de su tierra natal. Es agricultor y transportista de mototaxi desde hace 10 años, decidió realizar estas tareas porque le era muy necesario cuando se trata de vivir en la ciudad, se dio cuenta que su economía se mantiene estable y en caso del transporte puede ver diariamente las ganancias ya que en la agricultura tiene que esperar meses. El servicio de transporte que ofrece es todos los días y todo el día la ruta es local dentro de su comunidad. Teodoro se siente mas seguro desarrollando estas actividades y tiene planes para su futuro, desea tener ganadería y a su vez una unidad mas de mototaxi para lo cual seguirá esforzándose. Es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, decidió trabajar con de esta manera para mejorar las condiciones de su actividad económica ya que le informaron de las ventajas de acceder a un préstamo. Con del dinero va a mejorar la cochera de deposito que tiene en su misma casa y que le sirve para guardar su mototaxi para lo cual comprara cemento y otros materiales de construcción y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 44 years old and lives with his wife and son in their own house. He settled here seven years ago after moving from his hometown.

Teodoro has been a farmer and a mototaxi driver for ten years. He decided to work in these areas because he needed to do something to live in the city. He realized he needed a steady income, and with the transportation business he can see his earnings daily, since with agriculture he has to wait for months. He offers transportation services all day, everyday and has a local route in his community. Teodoro feels more secure having these activities, and he has plans for the future. He would like to have livestock and another mototaxi, and he keeps working toward this.

This is the first time he has had a loan with MFP. He decided to work in this way to improve his business conditions since he was told about the advantages of getting a loan. With the money, he will make improvements to the storage area he has at his house for storing his mototaxi. To do this he will buy cement and other construction materials and pay for labor.

loans.use: to improve the storage area he has at home for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Cristobal Javier

texts.es:
Cristóbal, vive con su esposa, él es panadero, tiene 3 años de estar en el negocio de pan, la panadería la tiene en su casa de habitación y posee una buena clientela.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra sacos de harina y azúcar, para la producción de pan, con estos materiales aumentara la producción en el negocio y abastecerá mejor a los clientes.
El propósito de Cristóbal es invertir en el negocio para satisfacer las exigencias de los clientes en la producción del pan.
texts.en:
Cristóbal lives with his wife.  He is a baker, and has three years in the bakery business.  He has his bakery in his home, and has a good customer base.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy sacks of flour and sugar for bread production.  With these materials, he will grow his business' production and better supply his customers.

Cristóbal's plan is to invest in his business to meet his customers' bread requirements.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour and sugar for his bakery.

loans.name: Lorena Isabel

texts.es:
Lorena, vive con su esposo y una hija de 12 años, Lorena administra una tienda en la que ofrece productos comestibles, está ubicado en el centro escolar, lleva 5 años en el negocio, trabaja de lunes a viernes de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella necesita comprarse mercadería para el negocio, por eso a través de un préstamo adquirirá sodas, jugos, boquitas, dulces y galletas, con esta compra estará preparada para atender la demanda de los estudiantes.
El propósito de Lorena es que por medio del fortalecimiento del negocio, sus ganancias mejoren para llevar a su hogar todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Lorena lives with her husband and 12-year-old daughter.  Lorena manages a store where she sells snacks; it is located in an education center.  She has spent five years in this business, and works from Monday through Friday, from 7 a.m. to 4 p.m.

She needs to buy merchandise for her store, and so as a result of this loan she will buy soda, juice, snacks, sweets, and cookies.  With this purchase she will be prepared to meet the demand of the students.

Lorena's plan is that by strengthening her business, her earnings will increase to provide her household with everything it needs.

loans.use: to buy soda, juice, snacks, sweets and cookies for her store.

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yanira, vive junto a su familia que está conformada por su esposo, dos hijos de las edades de 8 y 12 años, ambos estudian, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, pero además elabora hamacas, cortinas, matatas, su esposo le apoya mucho y su horario es de 8:00am a 5:00pm.
Actualmente ella quiere invertir un préstamo en materiales como hilo de seda de diferentes colores. Con esta ayuda estará contando con mercadería para confeccionar las hamacas y ofrecer  a los clientes.
Las aspiraciones de Yanira es que por medio de su trabajo apoyar a sus hijos, en sus estudios, que estos puedan culminar una carrera.
texts.en:
Yanira lives together with her family that is made up of her husband and two children aged 8 and 12 who both are in school. She sells fruits and vegetables, but in addition she makes hammocks, curtains, and tote bags. Her husband helps her a lot and her workday is from 8:00am until 5:00pm. 

Currently she wants to invest the loan in materials like silk thread in different colors. With this help she will have merchandise to make and offer hammocks to her customers. 

Yanira's dreams are to help her children in their studies by way of her work so that they may have a career. ,

loans.use: to buy silk thread to make hammocks.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Rosa Argentina tiene 45 años, por lo que su actividad económica es pulpería, hace más de 11 años que se dedica a este negocio, pues sus inicios se dan como una alternativa de fuente de ingresos necesaria ya que tiene 3 hijos de los cuales solo 2 tienen bajo su cargo, todos los financiamientos han sido de gran ayuda por lo que le dan el apoyo que necesitan. Actualmente solicitando para la compra de golosinas, detergentes, granos básicos, pan, sopas, enlatados entre otros. Su deseo es lograr que sus hijos finalicen sus estudios.
texts.en: Rosa Argentina is 45 years old, and her business is a grocery store. She's had this business for 11 years. Since its beginnings its provided an alternate means of necessary income as she has three children and two are in her care. All the income has been a great help to give her the extra help they need. Currently she is asking for a loan to buy candy, detergent, grains, bread, soup, canned goods, and the like. Her dream is to succeed so that her children can pay for their studies.
