loans.use: to buy candy, detergent, grains, bread, soup, canned goods, and the like.

loans.name: Wilberto

texts.es:
Wilberto, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 17, 14 y 11 años de edad, ellos administran como familia una tienda, donde todos colaboran en la atención a los clientes, llevan 5 años en el negocio.
Él está por el momento solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, como jabón, detergentes, aceite, arroz, frijoles, pues quiere mantener una tienda surtida y brindar un buen servicio a los clientes.
El propósito de él es darle mantenimiento al negocio, que sus ventas no decaigan y que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Wilberto lives with his wife and three children who are 17, 14 and 11 years old. The family has a store and they all work together to deal with the customers. They have had this business for five years.
At this time, he is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise like soap, detergent, oil, rice and beans.He wants to maintain a well-stocked store and offer his customers good service. 
His aim is to maintain this business so that his sales don’t fall and the customers always find what they need.

loans.use: purchase soap, detergent, oil, rice and beans for the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy construction materials to finish divisions and the plumbing in the grooming clinic in order to offer better service.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, vive en compañía de su esposo y tres hijos de 14, 8 y 4 años, poseen casa propia, ella lleva 5 años de estar dedicada al negocio, viaja hacia la capital para vender los productos.
Por el momento su dificultad es carecer de dinero para invertir, por eso es que a través de este préstamo espera superarse con la compra de sacos de semillas, esto le ayudara para tener más disponibilidad para los clientes.
La aspiración de Rosa es que los préstamos le ayuden a crecer y fortalecer sus ganancias para la familia.
texts.en:
Rosa works selling cashews.  She lives with her husband and three children, aged 14, 8 and 4 years old.  They have their own home.  She has been working in this business for five years, and travels to the capital to sell her products.

Right now, her difficulty is that she lacks the money to invest, so through this loan she hopes to overcome that with the purchase of sacks of cashews.  This will help her to have more available for her customers.

Rosa's hope is that the loans will help her to grow and strengthen her earnings for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of cashews.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her working capital to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Martha Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Marha es comerciante, casada y madre de dos hijos, cuenta con su pequeño negocio de ropa, cosmetico y otros accesorios.
Inicio este negocio con el fin de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, lo que comienza afiliandose a la Avon y con dinero propio, lo que comienza a ofertar sus productos por catalogos. Luego para introducir mas productos, y variedad lo hace con financiamientos en Afodenic, en donde lleva cuatro ciclos trabajando.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo sera para la compra de ropa interior, ropa de dama, y cosmeticos perfumes, cremas, losion, vanidad, maquillaje, pinturas de labios a si como la compra de chapas, pulseras de fantasias. Logrando aumentar las ventas,y logrando mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Martha is a merchant. She is married and has two children. She has a small business selling clothing, cosmetics and other accessories. She started this business to help her husband with household expenses. She affiliated herself with Avon and started out with her own money, offering products via catalog. She then started introducing more products and variety with the help of loans from Kiva partner Afodenic, and she has had four loan cycles. With this new loan she plans to purchase undergarments, women's clothing and cosmetics like perfumes, creams and lotions, makeup and lipstick, as well as earring and bracelets. Martha is hoping to increase her sales and thus increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Benito Antonio

texts.es: Benito Antonio tiene 57 años, su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de clínica dental. Hace más de 30 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo es un hombre luchador su historia ha sido de trabajar desde muy joven pues él empezó en el hospital en donde dio las prácticas fue así con el paso del tiempo decide establecer su propio consultorio. El financiamiento es para la compra de lámpara especial, pieza de mano de alta velocidad, vibrador para yeso entre otros artículos. Su deseo es agrandar su negocio para obtener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Benito Antonio is 57 years old.  His economic activity is providing clinical dental service.  He has had this business for more than 30 years, as he is a man who works hard.  His story is that he has worked since he was very young; he began practicing in a hospital, and with the passage of time, he decided to establish his own consulting practice.

The loan is to buy a special lamp, a high-speed hand-held piece, and a vibrator for the plaster, among other things.

His desire is to grow his business to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy a special lamp, a high-speed hand-held piece, and a vibrator for the plaster, among other things.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa tiene su propio negocio, una pulperia que trabaja desde hace varios años, pues es el medio de apoyar a su familia, es casada, madre de cuatro hijos estudiantes. Su esposo labora como fontanero.
Al iniciar lo hizo con dinero propio que su espso dio,  lo que atraves de los años ha crecido mas en ventas, ha logrado la captacion de los clientes, y podido equilibrar sus gastos.
Hoy en dia lleva, tres ciclos de financiamiento en Afodenic, lo que ha introducido mas productos, vende frescos naturales en diferentes sabores, venta de eskimo. Y con este prestamo comprara: productos lacteos, carne, pollo, granos basicos, frutas para hacer los refrescos, entre otros. Logrando el crecimiento de su negocio cada dia.
texts.en:
Josefa has her own business, it's a small grocery store where she has worked for several years.  It is her means of supporting her family; she is married and the mother of four children who are students.  Her husband works as a plumber.

To begin with, she used her own money that her husband had given her.  Over the years, she has increased her sales and gained customers, and she has been able to balance her costs.

As of today, she has had three financing cycles with Afodenic, with which she has introduced more products.  She sells natural fruit drinks in different flavors, and sells ice-cream.

With this loan, she will buy dairy products, meat, chicken, bulk grains, fruits for making the drinks, and other things.  She is achieving growth for her business on a daily basis.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of products for her small grocery store, achieving higher sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her inventory of eggs, flour, corn, milk, butter, etc.

loans.name: Emilia De Jesus

texts.es:
Emilia, administra una pupuseria y comedor, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 13 y 15 años de edad, trabaja desde hace 10 años vendiendo pupusas y comida, su horario es de 6:00am a 5:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, chicharrón, gaseosas, gatorade, jugos, para el negocio; el propósito de obtener el préstamo es mejorar con sus ingresos y ganar más clientes.
El deseo de Emilia es tener un negocio estable, fuerte con capacidad para atender la demanda de los clientes, además de proveer para su familia todo lo que sea necesario para el desarrollo y mejorar la condición económica.
texts.en:
Emilia runs a papusa (stuffed tortilla) shop and eatery. She lives with her husband and two children aged 13 and 15. She has worked for 10 years selling papusas and food. Her workday is from 6:00am to 5:00pm.  

She is asking for a loan to buy corn, pork, soda, gatorade, and juice for the business. The purpose of obtaining the loan is to improve her income and attract more clients. 

Emilia's dream is to have a stable business with a strong ability to meet customer demand and additionally to provide for her family all that is needed to develop and improve their economic standing.

loans.use: to buy corn, pork, soda, gatorade, and juice for the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Compra de mercaderia blusas, pantalones y short.

loans.name: Ana Jasmin

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de bisutería al por mayor, vive con su esposo y sus hijos de 12 y 2 años de edad, tiene 5 años de estar trabajando con el negocio de la bisutería, con este negocio ha logrado generar ingresos para su hogar.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de dos vitrinas y piedras para la elaboración de collares y pulseras, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar el negocio, teniendo exhibido sus productos, para que los clientes puedan apreciar los estilos de los accesorios.
El sueño de Ana es tener un negocio amplio, apoyando a sus hijos a través de él, y estabilizando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana has a business selling costume jewelry at wholesale.  She lives with her husband and their children aged 12 and 2.  She has had this jewelry business for 5 years, and with it she has managed to generate income for her household.

Now she requests a loan to buy two glass display cases and stones to make necklaces and bracelets. These purchases will help to improve her business by giving her a place to display her products so that her customers can appreciate the style of her accessories.

Ana's dream is to have a bigger business through which she can better support her children and stabilize her income.

loans.use: to buy 2 glass display cases and stones to use in making necklaces and bracelets

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Don Roberto de profesion cadete de taxi, trabajando desdes hace veinte años, el taxi es de su propiedad. Casado, padre de tres hijos, su esposa trabaja como doctora.
En su trabajo hay dia buenos, y dias, con poco trabajo, pero ha logrado el equilibrio. Don Robero ha venido haciendo mejoras a su casa con financiameinto que Afodenic ha dado en siete ciclos. con el credito anterior logro terminar muro en la parte de atrás, hoy con este nuevo prestamo, continuara en la parte de alado de su propiedad, ya que por ser grande el terrno no puede terminarlo todo.
Tiene piedras compradas para continuar, y comprara cemento, hierro, arena, tablas, piedrin entre otros materiales que ayude a la cosntruccion de su muro, teniendo asi mejor seguridad para su familia, contra el crimen organizado.
texts.en:
Roberto has worked as a taxi driver for 20 years and he owns his own taxi.  He is married and is the father of 3 children, and his wife works as a doctor.

In his work he has good days and days when there is little work, but he has managed to achieve a balance.  Roberto has been making improvements to his house through financing provided by Afodenic in 7 loan cycles.  With the previous loan, he managed to finish a wall at the back of the house.  Now, with this new loan, he will continue the wall at the side of his property, because he was not able to complete all of it. 

He has purchased stones to continue, and he will purchase cement, iron, sand, wood, gravel and other materials that will help with the construction of his wall. This wall will provide better security for his family against organized crime.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials so that he can continue building a wall  at the other end of his house

loans.name: Francisco Daniel

texts.es: Francisco Daniel tiene varios financiamientos con Fundación León 2000, pues se siente muy bien al realizar una nueva experiencia con créditos. Su actividad económica es la venta de repuestos de vehículo y ferretería, el un hombre muy responsable y disfruta de su negocio. Hace más de 18 años que se dedica a este negocio. Además solicita este financiamiento con el fin de obtener lo suficiente en materia prima ya que ha tenido muchos pedidos recientemente como llantas, llaves,  focos, vidrios entre otros. El deseo de Francisco  es mejorar las condiciones de su local ya que es muy pequeño y le gustaría ampliarlo.
texts.en: Francisco Daniel has had several loans through Fundación Leon 2000 and he feels very good about starting another borrowing experience. His economic activity is selling spare auto parts and hardware. He is a very responsible man and enjoys his business. He has more than 18 years of experience with his business. He is requesting this loan to obtain sufficient materials, as he has had many recent orders for items such as wheels, keys, headlights, glass, and others. Francisco's hope is to improve the conditions of his premises as they are very small and he would like to expand.

loans.use: to buy wheels, keys, headlights, glass, etc.

loans.name: Lourdes Esperanza

texts.es:
Lourdes, es viuda, vive con sus dos hijos de 17 y 12 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, lleva 20 años trabajando en esta actividad, cuando joven aprendió la preparación de las tortillas, porque su madre tenía el puesto de venta, de ahí adquirió experiencia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña y maíz, ya que se gasta rápido, y al comprar al por mayor obtendrá un mejor precio.
Esta compra le ayudara a producir más y trabajar de mejor manera, proveyendo para sus hijos lo necesario en ingresos.
texts.en: Lourdes is a widow and lives with her 2 children aged 17 and 21. She sells tortillas and has been doing this for 20 years. When she was young she learned how to make tortillas as her mother had a stall selling them and it was there she gained experience on the job. Currently she is asking for a loan to buy firewood and corn, as she quickly uses up her supplies and buying wholesale will give her a better price. This purchase will help her produce more and work more efficiently, providing her with the necessary income for her children.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn.

loans.name: Las Piedras Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Las Piedras está conformado por la señora Olegaria va a comprar con su crédito tortillas, papa, pollo, verduras, queso, crema para elaborar sus dobladas, la señora Edilia va a comprar huevo, azúcar, leche, jabón, aceite, la señora Oliva va a comprar teleras, jamón queso para preparar tortas, la señora Georgina Bibiana va a comprar chicharrones, paletas, chicles y dulces, la señora Oliva tiene 27 años de edad ella es madre soltera tiene 2 hijas menores de edad de 5 y 3 años de edad, están viviendo con sus padres y con su hermano, ella vende tortas, gelatinas, perfumes y cosméticos de Jafra, Avon, tambien los días sábados vende pozole y tostadas preparadas, ella solicito su crédito para comprar grenetina, jamón, salchicha, longaniza, teleras, aguacate y jitomate para elaborar las tortas y las gelatinas, ella inicio su negocio hace un año por falta de recursos económicos y para tener ingresos para la alimentacion de sus hijas, su negocio es importante porque tiene ingresos para irse manteniendo ella y sus hijas, a ella le gusta la venta de perfumes y cosméticos porque conoce a más personas y se siente orgullosa cuando recibe premios por sus ventas, su negocio es popular por las marcas de los perfumes y cosméticos que son muy conocidas,en los productos de las tortas y las gelatinas por su buen sabor ya que las prepara con cariño y esmero para que sus clientes regresen a consumir sus tortas y gelatinas, sus sueños y esperanzas son tener su propia casa y que sus hijas tengan estudio y que no les falte  nada. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “gracias, que Dios los bendiga ya que generan empleos propios, gracias por apoyar a las mujeres que queremos salir adelante en nuestros negocios y nuestras familias”.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is called Las Piedras and is made up of the following women: Señora Olegaria who with her part of the loan is going to buy tortillas, potatoes, chicken, vegetables, cheese and cream with which to make her dobladas; Señora Oliva is going to buy savoury bread, ham and cheese to make tortas; Señora Georgina Bibiana is going to buy pork crackling, lollipops, chewing gum and candy. 

Señora Oliva is 27 years old. She is a single mother and has 2 daughters, both minors aged 5 and 3. They are currently living with her parents and her brother. She sells tortas, gelatinas (jellies), perfumes and cosmetics by Jafra and Avon. On Saturdays she also sells pozole (a traditional Latin American stew) and tostadas. She is asking for a loan to buy gelatin, ham, sausage, spicy sausage, savoury bread, avocado and tomotoes with which to make her tortas and gelatinas. She started her business a year ago as she lacked the funds and income to feed her daughters. Her business is important as it gives her an income with which to take care of herself and her daughters. She likes selling perfumes and cosmetics because she gets to know more people and she feels proud when she receives awards for her sales. Her business is popular for its well-known brands of perfumes and cosmetics and her good-tasting tortas and gelatinas as she makes them with love and care so that her customers come back  for more. Her hopes and dreams are to have a house  of her own and that her daughters have the opportunity to study and lack for nothing. 

The members of the group want to tell Kiva and Fundación Realidad "Thank you, may God bless you as you generate jobs. Thank you for supporting women who want to succeed with their businesses and want their families to get ahead" (“gracias, que Dios los bendiga ya que generan empleos propios, gracias por apoyar a las mujeres que queremos salir adelante en nuestros negocios y nuestras familias”).

loans.use: to buy gelatin, ham, sausages, spicy sausage, savoury bread, avocados and tomatoes

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
María es madre de familia de 46 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Pucalá que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

María se dedica desde algunos años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puedan ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento para los mismos, una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  María es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y dedicada a sus hijos que lo único que quiere es que salgan adelante porque ellos se merecen lo mejor.
texts.en:
María is 46 years old and has a family. She lives with her children in her own house. The house has only electricity and is located in the rural district of Pucalá in the department of Lambayeque. This area is known for its farming and livestock rearing.

María has been breeding and raising pigs for some years. The pen is located at the back of her house. She feeds the pigs nutritionally-balanced food and once they reach their optimum size she puts them up for sale to her customers. With the income she is able to pay the household expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1200 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy more animals and their respective feed. Once fattened, she sells them to different local markets, the end purpose being to obtain a better price and so have a better income and better quality of life. María is a very hardworking and responsible woman who is devoted to her children and only wants that they get ahead in life as they deserve the best.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Espiga Y Luna Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Espiga y Luna está conformado por la señora Marlen va a comprar con su crédito ropa interior para dama y caballero, la señora Lucia va a comprar garrafones de agua, la señorita Miriam Karina va a comprar ropa Americana por paca, la señora Armanda va a comprar zapatos por catalogo para dama, caballero y niño. La señora Lucia tiene 34 años de edad, ella estudio hasta el 3er. año de secundaria. Ella es casada tiene 2 hijo un varón de 15 años de edad y una niña de 13 años de edad ellos estudian la secundaria, ella vende garrafones de agua purificada, ella solicito su crédito para comprar garrafones de agua, ella inicio su negocio hace 8 meses le dan credito de una semana, como su esposo trabaja en la embotelladora de agua, ella le dijo que le llevara garrafones de agua para vender. Su negocio es importante porque vende bien los garrafones de agua, es un trabajo honrado y está en su casa puede atender a sus hijos y a sus sobrinos que también viven en su casa. Sus sueños y esperanzas son que sus hijos estudien y que su negocio siga creciendo, ella está contenta con su préstamo por la oportunidad de crecer su negocio comprando más garrafones de agua. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les agradecemos sus préstamos gracias a ustedes podemos realizar nuestros sueños de crecer los negocios”.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is  called Espiga y Luna. It is  made up of: Señora Marlen who with her part of the loan is going to buy ladies' and men's underwear; Señora Lucia who is going to buy demijohns of water; Ms Miriam Karina who is going to buy used clothes by the bale; Señora Armanda who is going to buy ladies', children's and men's shoes by catalogue.

Señora Lucia is 34 years old. She studied up to third grade of high school. She is married and has two children, a boy 15 years old and a girl 13 years old. They both attend high school. She sells demijohns of purified water. She is asking for the loan to buy demijohns of water. She started her business 8 months ago. As her husband works at the water bottling factory, they give her a week's credit so she told him to bring her some demijohns of water to sell. Her business is important because the demijohns of water sell well; it is honest work and allows her to work from home so she can take care of her children and nephews who also live in her house. Her hopes and dreams are that her children study and that her business continues to grow. She is happy with the loan and for the opportunity of growing her business by buying more demijohns of water. 

The group members want to tell Kiva and Fundación Realidad that they "are grateful for your loans as because of you we can realize our dreams of growing our businesses" (“les agradecemos sus préstamos gracias a ustedes podemos realizar nuestros sueños de crecer los negocios”).

loans.use: to buy demijohns of purified water.

loans.name: Patrocinio

texts.es:
Patrocinio de 56 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pimentel que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera, crianza de aves de corral y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Patrocinio es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra alfalfa y ají, productos que se comercializan diariamente, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos diarios. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así mejorar económicamente.  Patrocinio es un hombre que se preocupa por que su negocio mejore y pueda ofrecerles más comodidades a su familia como se lo merecen.
texts.en:
Patrocinio is 56 years old. He lives with his family in his own house. The house has only electricity and is located in the rural district of Pimentel in the province of Chiclayo. The area is known for its fishing, poultry breeding and tourism.

Patrocinio is a farmer. He owns his own farmland where he sows alfalfa and chillis, products that are sold on a daily basis. Once he has harvested his crop, he sells it at the different markets in Chiclayo and in this way obtains an income to cover his living expenses.

He is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy fertilizers to improve his land as well as his crop, with the aim of selling it at a better price and thus improving economically. Patrocinio is man who cares about his business doing better and offering his family the comforts they deserve.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his land as well as his crop.

loans.name: Jose Hector

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, siembra maíz, vive con su esposa, cuatro hijos y dos nietos, su oficio es atender las labores agrícolas, el trabajar con la tierra, este ha sido su trabajo desde joven, ya que se lo inculco su padre desde muy joven.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y semilla de maíz, esto pues para realizar la nueva siembra, de la cual espera sea abundante y provechoso.
José se dedica cada dia con su mejor empeño, realizando los trabajos agrícolas, para llevar el sustento a su familia y contribuir para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who grows corn.  He lives with his wife, four children and two grandchildren.  His business involves carrying out his farming tasks and working the land.  This has been his work since he was a young man as his father taught him when he was very young.

José is currently requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and corn seed for his upcoming sowing period which he hopes will be abundant and profitable.

José gives his work his best efforts every day, carrying out his farming tasks so that he can provide for his family and contribute towards their development.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and corn seed

loans.name: Maria Doraliza

texts.es:
María es madre D. familia D. 61 años, vive con su hija en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio D. agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito D. Zaña que pertenece a la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Zona D. actividad agrícola, ganadera y turística.

María cuenta con su negocio D. venta D. comida D. forma ambulatoria en una zona muy transitada D. la zona, actividad que realiza desD. hace varios años, cuenta con su propia clientela, pero a pensado en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y utensilios, con la finalidad D. seguir brindando un buen servicio y satisfaciendo las necesidades D. sus clientes, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su hija.

Con su trabajo y sus ganas D. salir adelante María se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto D. sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno se propone una meta se pueD. hacer realidad, con el objetivo D. que su hija tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
María is a 61-year-old mother.  She lives in her own home which has water and electricity.  Her home is located in Zaña district, in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and tourism.

María has a food business.  She works as a itinerant street vendor in a very busy area.  She has been in this business for several years.  She has her own customer base and is requesting this loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy supplies and utensils so that she can continue providing a good service and meeting the needs of her customers.  She will use the income she makes to repay her loan and improve her daughter's quality of life.

Through her work and her desire to get ahead in life, María has gained the trust and respect of her neighbors, showing that when somebody sets themselves a goal, they can achieve it.  Her goal is to create a better future for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy supplies and utensils so that she can continue selling her food

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia D. 28 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

DesD. hace unos años aproximadamente Silvia se ha dedicado a la venta D. abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos),  útiles D. aseo y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa para su comodidad, con las ganancias por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades D. su casa.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo D. que su negocio siga adelante y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones.  Silvia es una mujer dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su familia al igual que mejorar económicamente.
texts.en:
28-year-old Silvia lives with her husband and children in her own home which doesn't have basic services and is located in the rural district of TambogranD., in Piura province.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

For the past few years, Silvia has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna and eggs), personal care products and drinks.  She set up her business in her home for her own comfort.  With the profits she makes from selling her products, she tries to cover all her household needs and expenses.

In order to expand her business, Silvia has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy more merchandise with which to stock her store.  Her sole goal is to get ahead in her business and have more products to sell her customers so that she can cover her loan and other obligations.  Silvia is a committed and hard-working woman who works to obtain more comforts for her family and improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy his own motorbike

loans.name: Lucia Felidilia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Primero de Agosto se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora Lucia es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido y se ayudan entre ellos. Tiene 45 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 6 hijos, 4 mayores de edad y las dos menores de 17 y 16 años que estudian en colegio, tres de sus hijos aun viven en su casa. El marido es comerciante.
 
Nuestra amiga es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que además de ganarse la vida realizando quehaceres domesticas en una casa de la localidad también junto a su esposo se dedican a la elaboración y ventas de donas (DONUTS) de varios sabores y colores, ella antes de salir a sus trabajo se encarga de elaborar las donas para que luego su esposo salga a vender por los alrededores o en la avenida principal de la ciudad, nos cuenta que llevan dedicados a esta actividad por tres años y que les va muy bien ya que estos productos son muy consumidos por las personas que transitan en esta avenida que une Manta con Portoviejo.

Este crédito es para comprar harina, azúcar, huevos, levadura y aceite para elaborar estos deliciosos productos.
 
Sus sueños son que sus últimas hijas sigan con sus estudios y sean profesionales para que tengan un mejor porvenir.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the 'Primero de Agosto' community bank meets in Montecristi canton.  This is an area which is famous for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts which are well known both at home and abroad.  It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Lucia is a founding member of her community bank and she enjoys being a member because the group is very united and the members help each other out.  Lucia is 45 years old and lives with her partner.  They have 6 children.  Four of their children are grown up and their two youngest daughters, aged 17 and 16, are in school.  Three of their children still live at home.  Lucia's husband is a salesman.

Our friend is a very hard-working woman as, in addition to working as a cleaner in a house in her town, she and her husband also make and sell different flavored and colored donuts.  Before she goes out to work, Lucia makes the donuts so that her husband can then go out and sell them in the surrounding area or in the town's main avenue.  She tells us that they have been in this business for three years and that it is doing well as these products are very popular with people who travel through this avenue which links Manta with Portoviejo.

Lucia will use this loan to buy flour, sugar, eggs, yeast and oil to make her delicious products.

Lucia's dreams are for her youngest daughters to continue with their studies and become professionals so that they can enjoy a better future.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, dyes, yeast and oil

loans.name: Ruth Idania

texts.es:
Ruth, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 5, 6 y 8 años de edad, ella administra una joyería, ofrece a los clientes oro y plata, además repara prendas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra joyas como cadenas, aretes, anillos, pulseras, estos productos son los necesarios para ofrecer a los clientes, ya que las joyas son el objetivo del negocio.
El objetivo de ella es tener otras sucursales, surtidas del producto, también mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth lives with her husband and her three children aged 5, 6 and 8.  She runs a jewelry store where she sells her customers gold and silver jewelry and also repairs jewelry.

Ruth is requesting this loan to buy jewelry such as chains, earrings, rings and bracelets.  She needs these products to sell to her customers as jewelry is the aim of her business.

Ruth's goal is to own other well-stocked branches and to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items such as chains, earrings, rings and bracelets

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz María D. 57 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia,  cuenta con sólo servicio D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece a Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la ganadería, agricultura y artesanía.

Luz María se dedica a la venta D. cerveza y gaseosas en su propio domicilio, esta actividad lo realiza desD. hace varios años, tiene más clientela los fines D. semana por diferentes eventos que hay, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.

Teniendo la oportunidad D. crecer Luz María a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1700 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. cerveza y otras bebidas, con la finalidad D. obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y para que su familia se supere cada día más.
texts.en:
57-year-old Luz María lives with her husband and son in her own home which only has electricity.  It is located in the rural district of TambogranD., in Piura province.  The people who live in this area raise livestock, farm and make handicrafts.

Luz María sells beer and soda in her own home.  She has been in this business for several years and has more customers on weekends because of the different events that take place.  Her business has enabled her to increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.

Having the opportunity to grow in her business, Luz María has requested a loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy a larger quantity of beer and other drinks.  Her aim is to make more profits and increase her number of customers so that she can repay her loan and help her family improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise (beer and other drinks)

loans.name: Vilma Beatriz

texts.es:
Vilma es socia del  Banco Comunal “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 23 años de edad, es conviviente y no tiene hijos.  Cuenta con educación superior.
Desde hace cuatro años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para comprar ropa (bordados) y también para  sus estudios.  Ella se dedica a la venta de artículos artesanales.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/.  1,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará lana de diferentes colores para las matices  de sus bordados.  Nos cuenta que  también trabaja junto con su esposo en la chacra en Tacna.
Su sueño es tener su casa bien amoblado  y poner un buen negocio de artesanía.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la amistad, el compartir de las socias y el trabajo en grupo.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the "Mujeres al Progreso de Juli” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito province, in Puno department.  She is 23 years old, lives with her partner, and doesn't have any children.  She completed her higher education.

Vilma has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for four years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles.  She used that money to buy embroidered items and also for her studies.  Vilma sells handicrafts.  She will use this new loan for 1,000 soles to buy wool in different colors for her embroidery work.  She tells us that she also works together with her husband on the farm in Tacna.

Vilma's dream is to own her own well-furnished home and to set up a good craft business.

What Vilma enjoys about her community bank is the friendship, sharing with her fellow members and working as a group.

loans.use: to buy wool in different colors

loans.name: Angela Meredies

texts.es:
Angela de 46 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Chepen que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Desde hace 3 años aproximadamente Angela se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos), frutas, verduras y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa para su comodidad y seguridad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones familiares.  Angela es una mujer responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más cosas que ofrecerle a su familia al igual que mejorar económicamente.
texts.en:
46-year-old Angela lives with her family in her own home which has all basic services.  Her home is located in the urban area of Chepen district, in La Libertad department.  This area is noted for its commercial activity, farming, livestock raising and tourism.

For approximately three years, Angela has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna and eggs), fruit, vegetables, and drinks.  Her business is located in her home for her own comfort and security as she is able to serve her customers at whatever hour she pleases.  She uses the profits that she makes from selling her products to try and cover all her household needs and expenses.

In order to expand her business, Angela has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy more merchandise to stock her business with.  Her sole aim is for her business to grow and to have more products to sell to her customers.  This will allow her to repay her loan and cover her family expenses.  Angela is a responsible, committed and hard-working woman who works so that she can have more things to offer her family and improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Silvana

texts.es:
Silvana es socia del  Banco Comunal “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Cuenta con estudios superiores.
Trabaja con el  Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, su primer préstamo fue  de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de productos artesanales.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de  S/.  2,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará veinte mallas para la pesca, dice que las compra en Juliaca y las vende en la localidad de Ilave.  Ella es profesora, pero tiene este negocio para poder solventar sus gastos y ahorrar para su futuro.
Su sueño es tener más capital para ser una empresaria exitosa.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son  las reuniones, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad de cada una.
texts.en:
Silvana is a member of the “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito province, in Puno department.  She is 25 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She completed her higher education.

Silvana has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business selling handicrafts.

Silvana will use this new loan for 2,500 soles to buy twenty fishing nets.  She says that she buys them in Juliaca and sells them in Ilave.  Silvana is a teacher but she has this business so that she can cover her expenses and save for her future.

Silvana's dream is to have more capital available so that she can become a successful businesswoman.

What Silvana enjoys about her community bank are the meetings, the punctuality and the responsibility.

loans.use: to buy twenty fishing nets

loans.name: Luz Bertha

texts.es:
La Señora. Luz es socia del banco comunal Tres de Noviembre, vive en la parroquia de Cumbe, este  lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la agricultura y cría de animales, son personas muy amables, carismáticas y trabajadoras.

Doña Luz tiene 76 años, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad,  casados e independientes. la casa en la que vive es el fruto de su trabajo en la juventud.

La Señora. Luz se dedica a la cría y venta de animales como cuyes, gallinas y vacas de las cuales vende la leche que obtiene. También labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es solo para su consumo.

En el banco comunal lleva varios años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de vacas.

Su meta es de criar más animales y seguir creciendo en esta actividad.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the 'Tres de Noviembre' community bank.  She lives in Cumbe parish.  This is a cold-climate area whose people work in commerce, farming and livestock raising.  They are very kind, charismatic and hard-working people.

Luz is 76 years old and widowed.  She and her husband had four children who are all now grown up, married and living independently.  The home in which she lives is the fruit of the work she did in her youth.

Luz raises and sells animals such as guinea pigs, hens and cows (whose milk she sells).  She also farms for her own personal consumption.

Luz has been a member of her community bank for several years and she will invest her new loan in buying cows.

Luz' goal is to raise more animals and continue growing in the business.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth es socia del  Banco Comunal “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 34 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Cuenta con educación secundaria.
La señora se dedicaba  a la venta de abarrotes, actualmente tiene una panadería - pastelería.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/  300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de abarrotes.
Este nuevo préstamo de  S/  1,500.00 nuevo soles, invertirá en la compra de cuatro quintales de harina, manteca.  Nos cuenta que vende y reparte pan todos los días, en el negocio le ayuda su esposo quien es profesor.
Su sueño es tener su casa propia, su carro y seguir adelante en el negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo de la cuenta interna, los ahorros y su ganancia.
texts.en:
Ruth is a member of the “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito province, in Puno department.  She is 34 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She completed high school.

Ruth sells groceries.  She also has a bakery - cake shop.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her grocery store business.

Ruth will use this new loan for 1,500 soles to invest in buying four 100lb bags of flour, and butter.  She tells us that she sells and delivers bread every day.  Her husband, who is a teacher, helps her in the business.

Ruth's dreams are to own her own home, to own a car and to get ahead in her business.

What Ruth likes about her community bank are the internal account loans, the savings and the interest she makes.

loans.use: to invest in buying four 100lb bags of flour, and butter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in buying tables for his recreational bar.

loans.name: Guillermo Ramon

texts.es: Guillermo Ramón tiene su negocio que es la venta de mariscos. Hace más de 15 años que tiene este negocio. Fue por su Mama que el logro aprender este medio de vida, el obtiene más clientes de manera ambulante por lo que tiene  que alistarse todos los días para salir muy temprano y ofrecer la variedad de productos que le solicitan. El crédito es para la compra de camarones, pescado, punches, jaibas, concha, chuletas entre otros mariscos.
texts.en: Guillermo Ramón has a business selling seafood.  He has had this business for more than 15 years and learned the trade from his mom.  He gains most customers working as an itinerant vendor and has to get ready to go out very early every morning to sell the variety of products that his customers request.  He will use this loan to buy shrimp, fish, 'punches', crabs, shellfish, 'chuletas' and other seafood.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, fish, 'punches', crabs, shellfish, 'chuletas' and other seafood

loans.name: Jannet Del Socorro

texts.es:
Janneth, de 35 años de edad, habita en la ciudad  de Granada, ella es comerciante, esta casada, es madre de dos hijos de 12  y 9 años de edad respectivamente, es dueña de una pulpería la cual tiene 5 años de tenerla. Inicio con una pequeña cantidad de caramelos, galletas y pan que vendía al cumplir 30 años de edad dejo de trabajar como domestica ya que sus hijos los cuidaba su abuelita y no les dedicaba tiempo, asi que tuvo que buscar una alternativa de trabajo que le permitiera tener ingresos y al mismo tiempo cuidar a sus hijos fue entonces que el esposo le dio un pequeño capital para invertir en la pulpería ella compro granos básicos. Cuando la pulpería tuvo un año de estar funcionando, ella hizo otra inversión y así la ha ido surtiendo poco a poco.  
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar frijoles al por mayor. Ella considera que es una buena época de comprar frijoles ya que están baratos y quiere aprovechar a vender lo mas que se pueda antes de que incrementen su precio en el mercado. En lo próximo es seguir trabajando para poder sacar adelante su negocio y hacerlo mas sostenible.
texts.en:
35-year-old Janneth lives in the city of Granada and is a shopkeeper.  She is married and has two children aged 12 and 9.  Janneth owns a grocery store which she has had for five years.  She started out selling just a small quantity of candies, cookies and bread.  When she turned 30, she stopped working as a domestic as her grandmother was looking after her children and she didn't have much time to spend with them.  She had to look for an alternative form of work which would allow her to make money and, at the same time, look after her children.  Her husband gave her a small amount of capital to invest in a grocery store business and she bought some basic grains.  When her grocery store had been running for a year, she made another investment and she has been gradually stocking it in this way.

Janneth needs this loan to buy beans wholesale.  She believes that this is a good time to buy beans as they are cheap and she would like to take advantage and sell as many as she can before their market price rises.  Janneth would like to continue working so that she can get ahead in her business and make it more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy beans wholesale

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Las Estrellitas Unidas del Titicaca”, ubicado en el distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos a su cargo.  Cuenta con educación secundaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace doce ciclos,  su primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de ganados como ovinos y vacunos, compró tres ovejas.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de   S/ 1,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará una vaca para luego venderla al instante aunque a veces las engorda por cuatro meses y así consigue un mejor precio.  Nos cuenta que las compra y vende en Pilcuyo.  La señora trabaja sola en el negocio, su esposo trabaja como chofer (transportista) fuera de la ciudad.
Su sueño es tener más capital para poder tener un restaurant y así mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son los ahorros y la ganancia del mismo.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the “Las Estrellitas Unidas del Titicaca” community bank which is located in Pilcuyo district, in El Collao province, in Puno department.  She is 31 years old, married, and has three children in her care.  She completed high school.

Gladys has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 12 loan cycles.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business buying and selling livestock such as sheep and cows.  She bought three sheep.

With this new loan for 1,000 soles, Gladys will buy a cow which she will sell immediately.  Sometimes she fattens the animals for four months and thereby obtains a better price.  She tells us that she buys and sells her animals in Pilcuyo.  Gladys works alone in her business.  Her husband works as a truck driver outside the city.

Gladys' dream is to have more capital available so that she can open a restaurant and thereby improve her income.  What she likes about the community bank are the savings and the interest.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Digna Eulalia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Digna es socia del banco comunal Tres de Noviembre, vive en la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la agricultura y cría de animales, son personas muy amables, carismáticas y trabajadoras.

La Señorita. Diga tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su mamá quien se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, la casa en la que viven es propiedad de su mamá.
 
Nuestra socia trabaja en una lavandería y lleva 4 años en el trabajo, labora de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. 

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su mamá, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado para apoyar a su mamá en el negocio.
 
Su meta es comprarse un vehículo.
texts.en:
Digna is a member of the 'Tres de Noviembre' community bank.  She lives in Cumbe parish which is a cold-climate area.  The locals work in commerce, farming and livestock raising.  They are very kind, charismatic and hard-working people.

Digna is 19 years old, single, and lives with her mom who raises and sells animals.  The house in which she lives belongs to her mom.

Digna works in a laundrette and has been in her job for four years.  She works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 6.00pm.

This is the first loan that Digna has taken out a loan from her community bank, which she was invited to join by her mom.  She will invest her loan money in buying livestock in order to support her mom in her business.

Digna's goal is to buy herself a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, está casada y tiene 8 hijos, 5 de ellos independientes.  Estudió hasta 4to de primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 25 ciclos, su primer préstamo fue de  S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de artesanía en bayetas y lanas, también se dedica a la venta de ovejas, chanchos y gallinas.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevo soles, comprará dos kilos de lana de todo color y bayeta para  realizar bordados, cojines, tapices y venderlos en el mercado de Juli.  La señora trabaja sola, nos cuenta que su esposo vive en la ciudad de Tacna y es profesor jubilado.
Su sueño es seguir con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es  la facilidad del préstamo y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the "Mujeres al Progreso de Juli” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito province, in Puno department.  She is 56 years old, married, and has eight children - five of whom live independently.  She studied up to the fourth year of elementary school.

Julia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 25 loan cycles.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business selling handicrafts made from baize and wool.  She also sells sheep, pigs and hens.

Julia will use this new loan for 1,000 soles to buy two kilos of wool in different colors and baize for making embroidered items, cushions and tapestries to sell in Juli market.  She works alone and tells us that her husband lives in the city of Tacna.  He is a retired teacher.

Julia's dream is to continue in her business and improve her income.

What Julia likes about her community bank is the ease of obtaining a loan and the interest she makes on her savings.

loans.use: to buy two kilos of wool in different colors and baize

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy air conditioning equipment for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Melida Carlota

texts.es:
La Señora. Melida es socia del banco comunal Tres de Noviembre, vive en la parroquia de Cumbe este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la agricultura y cría de animales, son personas muy amables, carismáticas y trabajadoras.

La Señora. Melida tiene 32 años, vive en unión libre y está embarazada a días de dar a luz a su primer hijo. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora prestando los servicios de su vehículo realizando fletes, la casa en la que habita es propiedad de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.

La Señora. Melida se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa en casa se dedica a la cría y venta de animales como ganado y cuyes a los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de abono para mejorar el terreno y tener buen pasto para sus animales.
 
Su meta es tener  casa propia.
texts.en:
Señora Melida is a member of the communal bank "Tres de Noviembre".  She lives in the parish of Cumbre; this area has a cold climate, and its people work in business, agriculture and raising livestock. They are very friendly, charismatic, and hard-working people.

Señora Melida is 32 years old.  She is in a common law marriage and is pregnant, within days of giving birth to her first child.  Her partner is a driver by profession, and works providing freight service with his vehicle.  The house where they live belongs to her parents, with whom they share the household expenses.

Señora Melida does the household chores, and as this takes place at home she also works raising and selling animals like cattle and guinea pigs, which she sells in her community.

This is her second loan with the communal bank, and she will invest it in buying manure to improve her land and grow good pasture for her animals.

Her goal is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Rosa Idalia

texts.es:
Rosa, es comerciante de ropa, está soltera vive con su familia, realiza sus ventas todos los días desde muy temprano, visita varias zonas cercanas al lugar de donde vive, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia.
Actualmente necesita comprase ropa, blusas, short y ropa interior para adulto y niños, esta inversión le ayudara para mejora el negocio y tener diversidad de productos para que sus ventas sean mejor.
El objetivo de ella es ahorrar para comprarse su propia casa.
texts.en:
Rosa's business is selling clothes.  She is single and lives with her family.  She makes her sales every day from very early in the morning.  She visits several nearby areas.  Her business came about through her own initiative. 

Rosa currently needs a loan to buy clothes - blouses, shorts and underwear - for adults and children.  This investment will help her to improve her business and have a range of products available in order to improve her sales.

Rosa's goal is to save up so that she can buy her own home.

loans.use: to buy clothes (blouses, shorts and underwear)

loans.name: Martha Reina

texts.es:
La señora Martha de 50 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Granada, esta casada, tiene dos hijos, ellas comerciante y sastre. Doña Martha inicio en la actividad de la costura hace 15 años  siendo este su primer negocio, luego se decidió poner una pulpería para tener ingresos extras desde entonces se ha  desempeñado ella sola en estos dos negocios que aunque no son tan grandes pero es una forma en la que se ayuda a mantener económicamente, se ha desempeñado con gran empeño y dedicación en sus labores del día a día.  
Solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como granos básicos, azúcar, aceite, carne, jabones, producto comestibles y materia prima como tela, botones, zipper, hilos para sus trabajos de costura. Esta inversión la ayudara a adquirir mejor materia prima para trabajar, ofrecer mejor servicio y calidad a sus clientes. Ella tiene metas como ampliar y mejorar su taller de costura y diversificar los productos de su pulpería.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha, age 50, lives in Granada city. She is married, has two children, and is a shopkeeper and a tailor. Martha started her tailor's business 15 years ago. This was her first business. Later, she decided to open a small grocery store in order to make an extra income. Since then, she has held down both businesses on her own. They are not very big, but this is how she helps maintain herself economically. She has worked with great determination and dedication in her day-to-day labour.
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of products such as basic grains, sugar, oil, meat, ham, other food items, and materials such as fabric, buttons, zippers and threads for her sewing work. This investment will help her to acquire better basic materials for her work, thus offering a better service and quality to her customers. She has goals such as expanding and improving her sewing workshop, and diversifying the products in her grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase products such as basic grains, sugar, oil, meat, ham, other food items, and materials such as fabric, buttons, zippers and thread for her sewing work.

loans.name: Juan Francisco Group

texts.es:
Marina Maribel es una microempresaria de 38 años de edad, casada y tiene tres hijas y dos hijos, es una persona muy trabajadora y optimista, y reside en la Aldea Juan Francisco en el municipio de Concordia.

Marina inició su negocio de venta de abarroteria hace unos 10 años atras cuando su esposo emigró a los Estados Unidos en busca del sueño americano. Ella y sus hijos quedaron solos por un tiempo y sin ninguna fuente de ingresos, entonces como la madre de Marina se dedicaba a la venta de abarroteria le ayudó prestandole algunos productos para que pusiera en su casa de habitacion una pequeña pulperia, y asi inició Marina. Luego de un tiempo se dio cuenta de que en FAMA otorgaban prestamos a personas con pequeños negocios y acudió a las oficinas y despues de hacer la solicitud de prestamo, éste le fue aprobado y con el dinero que recibió pudo comprar mas productos y devolverle a su madre los que le habia prestado. 

El prestamo que Marina esta solicitando lo necesita para comprar sal, azucar, pastas, arroz ,amteca, pasta dental, refrescos, sopas, papel higienico, cafe, dulces, pan, entre otros productos para consumo y uso domestico. Con el apoyo de este financiamiento podrá surtir su pulperia de mas y variados productos, y asi sus ventas aumentaran y sus ganancias seran mejores. 

Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y que llegue hacer un mini-mercadito y tambien instalar una caseta para vender golosinas por la noche. Sus compañeras de grupo se dedican a la venta de golosinas (Reyna) y rosquillas (Agustina). Marina ha obtenido por lo menos 10 prestamos en FAMA y eso le ha permitido tener su negocio activo y ha podido sostener a su familia y a sus hijas en la escuela.
texts.en:
Marina Maribel is a 38-year-old entrepreneur. She is married and has three daughters and two sons. She is a very hard-working and optimistic person who lives in the village of Juan Francisco in the Concordia municipality.

Marina started her grocery store 10 years ago when her husband emigrated to the United States in search of the American dream. She and her children were left alone for a time, without any source of income. So, since her mother sold groceries, she helped Marina by lending her some products so that Marina could convert part of her home into a small convenience store. This is how Marina got her start. Later, when she found out that FAMA provides loans to people with small businesses, she went to their offices. After making a loan request, it was approved. With the money that she received she was able to buy more products and return what she had borrowed from her mother.

Maria needs this new loan to purchase salt, sugar, pasta, rice, butter, toothpaste, soda, soup, toilet paper, coffee, sweets, bread, and other products for consumption and home use. With the support of this loan she will be able to stock her grocery store with more products and a greater variety. This way, her sales will increase and her income will be better.

Her goal is to expand her business until it is a mini-market, and also to set up a stand for selling candy at night. Her fellow group members sell candy (Reyna) and donuts (Agustina). Marina has taken out at least 10 loans from FAMA and this has allowed her to keep her business going, to maintain her family, and to keep her daughters in school.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for her grocery store.

loans.name: Cruz Alexandra

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 1 De Agosto se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi  conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Alexandra. Tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene una hija de 9 años de edad, la misma que estudia en escuela. Su esposo es radiotécnico.

Ella junto a su esposo tienen dos locales en los cuales arreglan todo tipo de artefactos eléctricos como: Tv, cámaras fotográficas, radios, entre otros muchos artefactos. También venden los repuestos que se requieren para arreglar dichos artefactos, mientras su esposo trabaja en el local de Montecristi, ella se encarga del otro que tienen en La Pila, con ellos trabajan dos personas uno en cada local, trabajan todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00 y los sabados y domingos hasta las 12h00, llevan en su negocio 7 años con el de Montecristi y dos años con el otro local.
P>
Este crédito es para comprar repuestos eléctricos y aceites. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque  con uno de los créditos pudieron instalar su otro local.
 
Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y agrandar mas el negocio.
texts.en:
The 1 De Agosto Communal Bank meets every fifteen days in the Montecristi Canton. This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its traditional craftwork, which is recognized nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous straw hats.

This is where Mrs. Alexandra lives. She is 28, married, and has one 9-year-old daughter from this relationship. Her daughter is in school and her husband is a radio technician.

She and her husband have two stores where they repair all kinds of electronics such as TV's, cameras, radios, and many more items. She also sells the spare parts that are needed for repairing these items, while her husband works in the Montecristi location. She is in charge of their La Pila location. This way, they each work in one of their locations. They work every day from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, and on weekends until noon. They have had the Montecristi location for seven years, and have had the other for two years.

This loan is for the purchase of spare parts for electronics, and oils. Alexandra is a founding member of the Communal Bank, and she likes it because she used one of the loans to open their other location.

Her dreams are to keep working and expanding the business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for electronics, and oils.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador, es agricultor, su actividad del día a día es realizar y cuidar los cultivos de maíz y frijol, él es viudo, vive con sus nietos de 9, 10 y 14 años, Salvador tiene muchos años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz, pues inicio desde muy joven, sus labores inician de 7:00am hasta las 3:00pm.
Actualmente necesita comprar abono y herbicidas, para tratar el cultivo, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar su agricultura, protegiendo el maíz de cualquier plaga, garantizándose una buena producción.
El objetivo de Salvador, en la actualidad es que su siembra sea provechosa y que sus nietos puedan sentirse apoyados y que en el futuro puedan terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Salvador is a farmer.  His daily work consists of growing and caring for his corn and bean crops.  He is a widower and lives with his grandchildren who are 9, 10 and 14 years old.  Salvador has been growing corn for many years as he started out when he was very young.  He works from 7.00am to 3.00pm.

Salvador currently needs to buy manure and herbicides for his crops.  This purchase will help him to improve his farming, protecting his corn from pests and guaranteeing a good production.

Salvador's current goals are for his crops to be profitable, for his grandchildren to feel supported and for them to be able to finish their education in the future.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides

loans.name: Jose Hipolito

texts.es:
José, se dedica a un taller de estructuras metálicas, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 4 y 3 años de edad, José tiene dos años de estar trabajando en el taller, trabaja a tiempo completo y de esta actividad obtiene lo necesario para su familia.
Actualmente necesita comprar materiales como hierro solido, hierro con ángulo, esto pues es su principal material para el trabajo,  al contar con estos realizara los trabajos pendientes, de los cuales espera que los clientes le paguen su valor.
El sueño de José es tener un taller fuerte, apoyar a sus hijos en todo lo necesario y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José has a metalworking workshop.  He lives with his wife and two children, aged 4 and 3 years old.  José has been working in the workshop for two years; he works full-time, and from this activity he earns what is necessary for his family.

Currently he needs to buy materials such as solid iron and angled iron, as this is the main material for his work. With these, he will be able to complete the remaining work, for which he expects his customers to pay full value.

José's dream is to have a strong workshop, to support his children in everything they need, and to provide them with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials for his workshop: solid iron and angled iron.

loans.name: Yamileth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Yamileth, originaria de la ciudad de Granada, de 32 años de edad, tiene tres hijos, ella es comerciante  dueña de una pulpería. Inicio su pulpería con las ganancias que obtuvo de su anterior trabajo  cuando tenía 28 años de edad, ya que quería independizarse y no trabajarle a nadie en particular así que tomo la decisión de poner su propio negocio. Anteriormente se dedico a la venta de pescado en le mercado que negocio que todavía tiene y son otros ingresos con los que se ayuda a sostener a sus familia. 
Ella quiere invertir el préstamo para comprar productos, como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, huevo, leche, carnes, productos de limpieza  para surtir su pulpería. Esto le facilitara tener mejor mercadería que ofrecer a sus clientes, podrá mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Su metas es salir adelante con su negocio para hacerlo estable y seguro, tener que ofrecerla a sus hijos para darles un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Yamileth is from the city of Granada.  She is 32 years old and has three children.  She owns a grocery store.  Yamileth started her grocery store business with the profits that she made from her previous job.  When she was 28 years old she wanted to start working for herself so that she didn't have to work for somebody else.  She took the decision to set up her own business.  She used to sell fish in the market.  This is a business that she still has and it provides her with additional income which helps her to support her family.

Yamileth would like to invest her loan in buying products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, milk, meat and cleaning products with which to stock her grocery store.  This will enable her to have better merchandise to offer her customers and she will be able to improve her sales and income.  Her goals are to get ahead in her business in order to make it stable and secure and to have something to offer her children so that she can provide them with a better future.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, milk, meat and cleaning products, to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Maritza Isabel

texts.es:
Maritza, vive con sus padres, está soltera y se dedica a la administración de una tienda, en su negocio ofrece a los clientes artículos de primera necesidad, tiene un año de experiencia y lo atiende a tiempo completo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de la canasta básicas como frijol, azúcar, arroz, aceite, huevos y jabón, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar las ventas a los clientes, ya que tendrá surtido el negocio.
El objetivo de Maritza es crecer con su tienda, surtirla y algún día culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Maritza lives with her parents.  She is single, and works managing a store.  Her business offers customers everyday items.  She has one year of experiences, and works here full-time.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of basic pantry items, such as beans, sugar, rice, oil, eggs and soap.  This purchase will help her improves sales to her customers, as she will have stocked up the business.

Maritza's goal is to grow her store, keep it stocked, and some day to finish her studies.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, rice, oil, eggs and soap for her store.

loans.name: Reinaldo

texts.es:
Reinaldo, se dedica a la reparación de llantas, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 16 años, su negocio es la venta de llantas usadas, también las repara por medio de parches, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 4 años.
Por el momento su necesidad es la compra de un lote de llantas usadas, ya que su negocio tiene demanda, quiere estar preparado para atender a los clientes, esta compra le ayudara muchísimo para superarse con el negocio.
El objetivo de Reinaldo es tener un local propio donde instalar el negocio, aumentar sus ganancias pero sobre todo apoyar a su familia incondicionalmente.
texts.en:
Reinaldo works repairing tires.  He lives with his wife and 16 year old son.  His business is selling used tires, and he also repairs them with patches.  He has had this business for four years.

For now, he needs to buy a batch of used tires, as he has demand for them in his business and he wants to be prepared to service his customers.  This purchase will help him greatly to succeed with the business.

Reinaldo's goal is to have his own premises for his business, to increase his earnings, but above all to support his family unconditionally.

loans.use: to buy tires for his business.

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Ángela de 31 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Granada, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de Ropa y Zapatos, lleva 7 años en este negocio. Inicio a los 20 años de edad con una pequeña pulpería luego comenzó a trabajar con créditos y gracias a eso pudo vender ropa y zapatos en su casa, después siguió surtiendo su venta de pulpería y venta de ropa. Actualmente tiene 2 local en el mercado, para eso lucho muy duro convirtiéndose este negocio en su fuente de ingresos.  
Requiere el préstamo para comprar nueva mercadería de ropa y zapatos, productos variados de uso cotidiano. Esta inversión será de gran ayuda pues siente que le ayudara a mejorar la diversidad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes. Ella piensa lograr diversificarse como comerciante, quiere tener una cadena de tiendas de ropa y zapatos dentro del mercado de Granada.
texts.en:
31-year-old Ángela is a single mother with three children who lives in the city of Granada.  She is a saleswoman and sells clothes and shoes.  She has been in the business for seven years.  She started out at the age of 20 with a small grocery store.  She started working with loans and, as a result, was also able to start selling clothes and shoes from her home.  She continued stocking her grocery store and also sold clothes.  She currently has two stalls in the market and has worked very hard to turn this business into her source of income.

Ángela needs this loan to buy new merchandise.  She will buy clothes, shoes and a variety of essential household products.  This investment will help her a lot as she feels that it will help her to improve the range of products that she has to offer her customers.  She plans to diversify as a saleswoman and would like to own a chain of clothes and shoe stores in Granada market.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise (clothes, shoes and a variety of essential household products)

loans.name: Alba Nubia

texts.es: Alba Nubia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, por lo que tiene más de 3 años que se dedica a este negocio por lo que tiene que mantener a sus 3 hijos que son menores de edad. Por lo que desde muy temprano ella se levanta a organizar los productos que tiene que mostrar a cada uno de sus clientes, por lo que cada uno tiene diferentes gustos. Pues ella es una persona muy responsable. Ella necesita este financiamiento para la compra de lápiz labial, maquillaje, cremas, colonias y shampoo. Su deseo es establecer una tienda en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Alba Nubia works selling cosmetics.  She has been working in this business for more than three years, as she has to support her three young children.

For this reason, she gets up very early to organize the products that she is going to show to each of her customers, as each one has different tastes.  She is also a very responsible person.

She needs this financing to buy lipstick, makeup, creams, colognes, and shampoo.

Her hope is to establish a store in her home.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, makeup, creams, colognes, and shampoo.

loans.name: Yessica Amparo

texts.es:
Yessica, es comerciante de ropa, es madre soltera de una niña de 8 años de edad, también vive con ella su abuela, el negocio de Yessica es la venta de ropa y venta de queso, inicio por necesidad a comercializar con estos productos, ya que debe proveer para su hija ingresos que solventen las necesidades de educación, salud y comida.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa para niños como trajes, camisas, vestidos, y ropa interior, esta compra le ayudara muchísimo para tener el negocio más surtido de nuevos estilos en ropa.
El sueño de ella es que en futuro su hija pueda ser profesional, comprarse su propia casa y para ese tiempo que su negocio haya crecido mucho.
texts.en:
Yessica is a clothing businesswoman.  She is a single mother with an 8-year-old daughter, and her grandmother also lives with her.  Yessica's business is selling clothes and selling cheese.  She started this out of necessity for marketing these products, as she must provide income for her daughter to cover the necessities of education, health and food.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of children's clothing such as outfits, shirts, dresses, and underwear.  This purchase will help her greatly to have her business better stocked with new styles of clothing.

Her dream is that in the future, her daughter can become a professional, that she can buy her own home, and that her business will have grown greatly by that time.

loans.use: to buy clothes: outfits, shirts, dresses, and underwear for her business.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, vive con su familia, su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica a la carpintería, este oficio lo inicio cuando trabajó en un carpintería, actualmente trabaja en lo propio y no tiene un horario fijo para trabajar.
Él está nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para comprarse madera, pegamento, barniz, para la  elaboración de muebles, esta compra le ayudara a tener todo lo necesario para ejecutar su trabajo y mejorar los productos a los clientes.
El objetivo de Luis es poco a poco tener un negocio amplio, tener la oportunidad de ser distribuidor, y apoyar a sus hijos y esposa en todo lo necesario, velando por su bienestar.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his family (his wife and two children).  He is a carpenter and started out in this trade when he used to work in a carpenter's workshop.  He currently works in his own workshop and doesn't work fixed hours.  He is requesting a new loan in order to buy wood, adhesive and varnish for making furniture.  This purchase will help him to have available everything he needs in order to carry out his work and improve the products he makes for his customers.

Luis' goals are to gradually expand his business, to become a wholesaler, to support his wife and children and to ensure their well-being.

loans.use: to buy wood, adhesive and varnish for his workshop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and eggs to make bread

loans.name: Martha Maria

texts.es:
