Maritza, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene tres hijos de 8, 5 y 2 años de edad, vive junto a ellos y su esposo, Maritza vende tortillas y además vende productos cosméticos de la revista AVON, lleva 4 años en el negocio, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 7:00am a 12:00md.
Actualmente solicita préstamo para la compra de una carga de leña, pues esta la consume a diario en el cocimiento del maíz y la elaboración de las tortillas, con esta compra podrá tener para un buen periodo la leña.
Con la inversión espera tener una mejoría en su negocio, que aumenten sus ganancias; Maritza tiene por objetivo velar por las necesidades de sus hijos y sobre todo porque estudien para que se superen.
texts.en:
Maritza works selling tortillas.  She has three children aged 8, 5 and 2 years old, and she lives with them and her husband.  Maritza sells tortillas and also sells cosmetics from the AVON catalog.  She has been doing this for four years, and works from Monday to Saturday, from 7 a.m. to noon.

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy a crate of firewood, as she uses this on a daily basis for cooking the corn and making the tortillas.  With this purchase, she will be able to have firewood for a period of time.

With this loan, she hopes to improve her business, which will grow her earnings.  Maritza's objective is to see to the the necessities for her children, and above all because they are at school, for them to do well.

loans.use: to buy firewood for her tortilla business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Beth

texts.en:
Beth has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 30 years. She is a widow, 67 years old, and has three children.  

She was introduced to KADET Ltd.  by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In the future, Beth hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is 50 years old, married, and has four children.  

To earn a living, he runs a retail shop selling household goods. He has been in the business for over ten years. He also does farming for more income generation.  

Moses hopes to expand his business into wholesale within five years.

He has requested for a loan of 50,000 KES to buy plastic plates, buckets and basins.

loans.use: To buy plastic plates, basins and buckets.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando vive con su compañera de vida y su hija la cual asiste a una escuela cercana a la localidad rural donde residen. El posee una venta de panes ambulante, vendiendo en la zona urbana de la localidad en la que vive. Todas las mañanas se desplaza desde su casa junto a su carrito de panes caminando hasta la zona urbana por lo menos treinta minutos y después de llegar va por parques, calles principales, negocios y cualquier otro sitio que concentre clientes, ofreciendo sus ricos panes. Así recoge fondos para sostener su hogar, los panes que comercia son muy solicitados en la zona que visita pues tienen fama de tener un sabor exquisito, los prepara de diferentes formas con salchicha, carne, jamón y pollo, siempre al gusto del cliente, además son a precios realmente accesibles y les ofrece un servicio excepcional; Armando es un hombre dispuesto a cumplir sus sueños con trabajo arduo, él piensa que primero hay que dominar nuestros pensamientos nuestras metas para así poder dominar las circunstancias, de esta forma es como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima como panes, embutidos, carne de res y pollo. Armando tiene confianza en que su esfuerzo será el primer paso para poder darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Armando lives with his life companion and his daughter, who attends school near where they live. 

He works selling sandwiches as a street vendor, selling in the urban area of the community where he lives.  Every morning, he leaves his home with his cart, and walks for at least thirty minutes to the urban area.  There he goes to the parks, the main streets, businesses, and some other sites where customers are concentrated, offering his delicious sandwiches for sale.  In this way he earns money to keep up his household.  The sandwiches that he sells are much requested in the area he visits, as they are famous for their exquisite taste.  He makes different kinds, with sausage, beef, ham, and chicken.  They are always to the taste of the customers, and are also really affordable, plus he provides exceptional service.

Armando is a man who is inclined to achieve his dreams through hard work.  He thinks that first you must master your thoughts and your goals, to be able to master your circumstances.  This is why he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy raw ingredients such as bread, sausage, beef, and chicken.

Armando has confidence that his effort will be the first step in providing his family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausage, beef and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Antony

texts.en:
Antony is a hardworking businessman, aged 32. He is married and blessed with one child. 

Previously, he was involved with a business of selling milk and eggs. For the last three years, he has been managing a motorcycle transport business to support the family. In the next five years, he wants to buy a car for the transport business. 

He is requesting for a loan of 40,000 KES to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Runyararo Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 40-year-old Lennon from Masvingo. He is married and has four children age 2, 9, 12 and 16, with three attending school. 

Lennon buys and sells engine oil and filters. The business has been in operation for two years. He says the main challenge he faces is the lack of funding to buy more commodities. 

Lennon has requested a loan of $400 to buy engine oil and filters. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to improve his standard of living, have more disposable income and be able to pay school fees without difficulties. 

In the future, Lennon plans to open a shop in town.

loans.use: To buy engine oil and filters for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case and basic grains.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy leather for making belts, jackets and handbags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an extension on a room, purchasing materials such as bricks, metal sheets and cement, and paying labor costs

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: Feliciano de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive con su compañera de vida. El posee una carpintería muy conocida en la localidad donde reside,es una artesano de la madera desde hace mas de 20 años, elabora excelentes muebles y de muy buena calidad por los tipos de calidad de madera usada, como mesa, sillas, sillones entre otros; Feliciano siempre les ofrece el mejor servicio además de los precios más accesibles del mercado, el se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador dispuesto a trabajar duro para lograr sus metas, está dispuesto a sembrar una acción y cochechar un habito, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima, madera de diversa calidad por mayor, pegamento, herramientas entre otros. Feliciano tiene confianza de que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
56-year-old Feliciano lives with his life partner.  He owns a very well-known carpenter's workshop in the town where he lives.  He has been working as a wood craftsman for more than 20 years.  He makes excellent furniture which is very good quality because of the quality of the wood that he uses.  He makes tables, chairs, armchairs, etc.

Feliciano always offers his customers the very best service and some of the most affordable prices on the market.  He is noted as being a hard-working man who is prepared to work hard to achieve his goals.  He is prepared to sow an action and harvest a habit.

Feliciano is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy raw materials: different qualities of wood (wholesale), adhesive, tools, etc.  Feliciano believes that, through his efforts, he will manage to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy different qualities of wood wholesale, adhesive and tools

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: Ana María D. 41 años D. edad, madre soltera, vive con sus tres hijos y posee un chalet en la cercanía a su casa. El negocio se haya instalado en una localidad muy concurrida D. personas, venD. pupusas, gaseosas, jugos dulces y otros, todo D. muy buena calidad, higiénico, a un buen precio y con un servicio excelente; Ana María es una mujer activa y positiva, con ganas D. salir adelante, ella piensa que con perseverancia se mueven montañas y es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frijoles, chicharrón,  queso, bebidas, golosinas, para D. esta forma satisfacer la necesidad D. los clientes que han demandado mas sus productos en los últimos días y ver crecer el negocio. Ana María tiene la esperanza que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia seguridad económica y una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Ana María , 41, is a single mother and she lives with her three children and she has a bungalow near her house.  She has set up a business in her area that is very popular. She sells pupusas (typical food of El Salvador-tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, or pork and grilled), soft drinks, juices, and more.  All her food is good quality, clean, reasonably priced, and she offers excellent service.

Ana María is an active and positive woman who wants to get ahead.  She thinks that you can move mountains with perseverance and that is why she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will help her buy corn, beans, pork skins, cheese, drinks, and sweets.  This way she can give her customers what they want in their latest requests for products, and it will enable her business to grow.

Ana María  has hopes that with effort she will be able to give her family more financial security and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, pork skins, cheese, drinks and sweets

loans.name: Celia Margarita

texts.es: Celia Margarita de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive con su compañero de vida. Ella posee una venta de huevos y de artículos varios, donde vende todo tipo de productos como bisutería dulces, papel higiénico entre otros sobre una de las calles principales de la localidad donde vive; se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente. Las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos necesitan además del buen servicio, siempre con una sonrisa para el cliente, para Celia algo importante  es pensar en grande para que crezcan los hechos, es por eso que se decidió solicitar a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar huevos por mayor, papel higiénico y dulces a fin de que obtenerlos a un menor costo y generen así mayores ganancias. Celia Margarita espera que su trabajo le dé a su familia y a ella una vida plena.
texts.en: Celia Margarita, fifty-six years old, lives with her life partner. She owns a stand where she sells eggs, various goods, and all types of products like miscellaneous goods, sweets, toilet paper, among others, on one of the main streets of the town where she lives. Recently, many customers have been gained. People prefer her because she always has what they need apart from the great service and smile she always has for her customers. For Celia it's important to think big so that bigger things happen. For this reason she decided to apply to INTEGRAL, a loan that allows her to buy eggs in bulk, toilet paper and sweet so as to obtain them at a lower price and thus generate higher earnings. Celia Margarita hopes that her work gives her and her family a full life.

loans.use: eggs, sweets, various goods.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr:
Adjovi est une femme âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée à un retraité. Elle a 6 enfants.
Adjovi travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2011. Elle vend des produits d’alimentation général (lessives, laits, pates alimentaires) à toutes les personnes. Elle achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé.  Elle travaille avec 2 personnes. 
Adjovi a requis son premier crédit  à  WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre les lessives, les pates alimentaires, les laits. Elle veut étendre son activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Adjovi voudrait agrandir son marché. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit  avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Adjovi, age 46, is married to a retiree and has six children. She's been working as a salesperson since 2011. She sells general food products (laundry detergent, milk, pasta) to anyone. She gets her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé, and works with two persons.

Adjovi is seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy and sell laundry detergent, pasta and milk. In the forthcoming years, she would like to expand her business and her shop. She says that her profits will help to make her family happy.

loans.use: to buy laundry detergents, pasta, and dairy products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her house by paying for materials, such as bricks, cement and labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel de 56 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa de 57 años y sus 3 hijas las cuales se encuentran estudiando. Daniel se dedica  a la venta sorbetes y minutas en los alrededores de la zona donde el habita. Ha logrado establecer una buena clientela los cuales lo prefieren por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable e higiénico. Daniel desea poder dar a sus hijos el estudio y algún día poder verlos convertidos en profesionales con mejores oportunidades de vida. Esto es lo que impulsa a Daniel a trabajar duramente para poder lograr su sueño y poder dar a su familia lo mejor posible. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración de minutas como: agua, jarabes, limones, chile, sal, desechables y variedad de paletas de tal modo que su negocio mejore y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Daniel is 56 years old and lives in his own house with his family, which consists of his 57 year-old wife and three daughters who are studying.  Daniel sells sorbets and shaved ice snacks around the area where he lives.  He has established good clientele who prefer him for being a hardworking, responsible, and hygienic man.  Daniel hopes to be able to give his children an education and one day see them become professionals with better opportunities in life.  This is what drives Daniel to work hard to achieve his dream and give his family the best.  He has decided to request this loan with INTEGRAL to invest in his business and buy the raw materials necessary for the preparation of shaved ice snacks including water, syrups, lemons, chiles, salt, disposable cups and a variety of popsicles, so that his business improves and as a result, so does the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy the raw materials necessary for the preparation of shaved ice snacks including water, syrups, lemons, chiles, salt, disposable cups and a variety of popsicles.

loans.name: Concepción De María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua, la señora Concepción De María es una persona trabajadora de buenos valores morales  que se dedica arduamente a laborar en circulación bibliotecaria y se dedica a esta labor desde hace veintitrés años. Es soltera y tiene cinco persona a su cargo.

Actualmente ha acudido a Ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar la condición de su vivienda en la compra de materiales de construcción tales como bloque, cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra, para construir baño en su vivienda, así brindarle una condición mejor a su familia, este es el primer crédito con Ceprodel para dale un mejor nivel  de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Concepción De María lives in Managua, and she is a hardworking woman of good moral values. She works in a library as circulation technician, a job she has been laboriously doing for twenty-three years. She is single with five people in her care.

She has come to CEPRODEL to ask for a loan she will use to improve the conditions of her house. She will buy construction materials such as blocks, cement and iron, as well as to pay for labor costs. She will have a bathroom built in her house to offer belter living condition to her family. This is the first loan she has requested to CEPRODEL to give a better standard of living to her family.

loans.use: To buy construction materials and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase appliances and electrical equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction material to finish building a room in his house.
